30a5(mdo sde): dbyangs dang rol mo'o sgra de las kye ma'o bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang / bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste/ blta bar mi bya'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed do// de de'itshe
30a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na gsad par bya ba'i mis mthong na/ ngo mtshar gyi sems mi bskyed pa de bzhin du/ rgyal bu gnon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang bud med de dag mthong na ngo mtshar du mo 'dzin to// gleng kyir
30a7(mdo sde): de la yang grog dang lhan cig ngo mtshar du 'dzin to/ / lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par 'gyur snyam pa dang bdaku na ma zhig na pag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / des bdag /
30b1(mdo sde): thar bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sem 'jug pa ma gtog par/ nam yang gzugs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar mgyur te/ sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung ba ma gyur to//
30b2(mdo sde): de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od zer ldan la lha gzhon nu mi rol to// dgyes par mi mdzad do// dgyes dgur mi spyod do zhes smras so// bam
30b3(mdo sde): gsum pa ste tha ma'o/ / yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ gdong las mchim
30b4(mdo sde): 'dzag cing lus 'dar te/ mya ngan gyis sa la 'gyel to// de sa las langs nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshogs su bcad de smras pa/ bu gcig rin chen dam pa nga la ltos shing smos/
30b5(mdo sde): nga ni mya ngan gzer te khyim na sa la sgyel// su yis khyod mi dga' byas te myur nga la smros// de 'dir de'u chad pa chen pos gcad par bya// khyed kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis smras pa// lha yi khyim ltar
30b6(mdo sde): nyams dga' grong khyer deng ltos shig/ 'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod de myur smros// brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan// pad+ma'i mig can mi mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa// lha si
30b7(mdo sde): bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos/ / mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang da ring rtses// ci'i phyir zug rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug/ de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi
31a1(mdo sde): yan lag snyan/ glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyis rnam par nges par shes// khyod dag 'a dus la deng bang mya ngan ma byed cig/ pad+ma rnying pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman// me tog 'bras
31a2(mdo sde): bu yal ga 'dab rgyas skyed mos tshal/ / sna tshogs steng bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra// soms shig khyod kyi na tshod 'di ni thog ma yin// dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis deng 'di bu dga' gyis// khyod kyi
31a3(mdo sde): khrus ched rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra/ / ut+pal dag dang pad+ma dag gi tshal gyis gang // pad+ma rnams kyang bung ba rgyas pa mchog gis brgyan// de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed// ngang pa rma bya ne tso'u
31a4(mdo sde): byug ri skegs dang / / ka la bing+ka shang shang te'u dang kun la// yid 'ong sgra ldan gangs nye spos ngad ldan 'dra ba// thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur// gzhal med khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu
31a5(mdo sde): / gtsug/ gser dang bai DUR+Shas spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra// rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba// gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i 'phreng ba sgra snyan pa// zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyar smra bsgrag
31a6(mdo sde): bapa/ ra khyod kyi ched du srang rnam su yang sbyin rgya che// bu mo stong dag klu mchog sman pa'i sgra 'byin pa// dga' tshal lha yis bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog/ mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir// rnam
31a7(mdo sde): par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis dga' mi byed/ / gzhon nu khyod kyi rtse grogs lha yi bu 'dra ba// bu pho de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mos gyis// khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug/ skyes po
31b1(mdo sde): 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci/ / 'dus byas yid byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod don mi gnyer// yon tan bsngags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong nges smras pa// 'khor ba'i dra bar chung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/
31b2(mdo sde): thar pa den gnyer ba la smras pa yab gson cig/ lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' ba gyis mi mchis// bdag ni de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yangs
31b3(mdo sde): ltung byed pa/ / sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung // mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dga'// bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yang sa che/ rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos
31b4(mdo sde): de dag de ltar smad/ / sems dmya ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bsten// bud med 'di dag pogs pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam// bdag ni rus rgyus 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer// khrag
31b5(mdo sde): dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag/ gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi// glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi// dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rdzogs par bgyid
31b6(mdo sde): kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis/ / ci phyir byas pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs kho le// shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na// dgon dung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar
31b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ma lags/ / mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad bshig gyur te// srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med 'gyur// sems ni rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus/
32a1(mdo sde): srid pa rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod// 'dod rgyus phan tshun gsad pa'i 'gro la bltas nas su// 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi g.yo bzhin// rgyal po
32a2(mdo sde): khyod dang pha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang / / gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyes min// bdag cag thams cad rtswa rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste// sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur bag yod mdzod//
32a3(mdo sde): mi dbang dar la bab pa mau rtag cir mi rung // srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro tsor mi rung // 'dus byas 'di zad glog sprin 'dra ste cir mi rung // rgyal po mkhas la srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan/
32a4(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul// 'jig rten phan pa'i snying brtses sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi// rgyal po bag med spyod la
32a5(mdo sde): byang chub yod ma lags/ / rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen spyod sems 'khol ba// de ni bsod nams cung zad dga' zhing mtho ris ldog/ 'tshe ba shin tu rgyas pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi// skon par
32a6(mdo sde): bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs phyin gyur/ / khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 'dra// zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs// rgyal po 'di ni dug sdong me tog
32a7(mdo sde): rgyas 'dra lus/ / chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'// rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang // 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas// rgyal po de ring
32b1(mdo sde): 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang / / gnyid legasad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang // zug rngu rtsa nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir// bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni myur du sbyar// stong chen du ni bcings pa/
32b2(mdo sde): rnam grol rab bsgrags nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dngul ba tshim par bgyi// ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang gdon par brgya// long ba mig sbyin sred pa'o 'okhra shing bskam par bgyi// rnam
32b3(mdo sde): grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar me byas/ / de yis srid gsum gar la lta ba 'dra mthong 'gyur// byams dang snying rje pha rol phyin pa sprin// sems can de 'brug lhag mthong glog gi 'phreng ba dang /
32b4(mdo sde): byang chub yan lag bde ba sil char rgyun dra ba yis// 'gro ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi// rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te// bdag ni 'dus byas kun la 'dod pa smon ma mchis//
32b5(mdo sde): byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi// gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis// rgyal po 'di ni shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas// blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du
32b6(mdo sde): 'gro/ / mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'din g.yang sar ltung // byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro bdag ni rgyun bzlog pa// rgyal po chog tsam gyis ni byang chub thob
32b7(mdo sde): mi nus/ / lhun po rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchod spro yi// bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de lta min// rgyal po dam pa rang gnyen thabs cig myur du bzhud// yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad
33a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun la stsal/ / gang dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur// yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags// bud med tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas
33a2(mdo sde): byang chub dang / / grub bde zhi ba bla med gnas ni thob mi nus// dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub brnyes pas na// bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po
33a3(mdo sde): gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khang bzangs kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig pa chag cing / de spyod lam gsum gyis gnas so// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
33a4(mdo sde): 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su spangs so// khang pa'i steng du song ste/ sa brgyad la gnas nas/ de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha
33a5(mdo sde): rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing / bar snang las 'gro ba dang / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba thos so// thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod
33a6(mdo sde): nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas mchi ma zag cing / skyo ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas/ lha rnams la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gal te skye
33a7(mdo sde): mi mdzad nas cung zhig zhu bar bgyi/ / su yin yon tan brjod cing bde bar 'di nas bzhud// tshig 'di thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur// yul 'khor skyeng de nas lha de dag gis/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams
33b1(mdo sde): kyi 'od zer la tshogs su bcad pas skar smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam// don grub blo zhes bya ste skyabs med rnams kyi bskyabs/ de bzhin spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan/
33b2(mdo sde): mchog/ de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stobs bcu bsam gtan pa// bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal ba 'tshal de yi gzugs ci 'dra// de yi kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig/ ji ltar
33b3(mdo sde): spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba/ / byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dri// de nas lha de dag gis// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshogs su bcad pas slar smras pa// de yi
33b4(mdo sde): gtsug tor ra yi rtse la gser mdzes bzhin/ / dbu sra 'dzam zhing mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil ba ste// de yi mdzod sbrum pa' la nyi ma lam me lha// nor bu shel skar rnam par dag cing g.yas su 'khyil// spyan
33b5(mdo sde): dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ut+pal sngon po 'dra/ / mi dbang seng ge'i 'gram pa rang byung ba yi spros// sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed// stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang
33b6(mdo sde): skyems/ / de yi tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dung ltar dag/ bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thags bzang rmad byung legs par grub// rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi mche ba bzhi// de yi ljags ni rab yangs rang gi
33b7(mdo sde): zhal gdong khengs/ / rgyal ba de yi gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don// shin tu tshim byed 'brel cing gya gru med pa ste// tshangs sbyangs shin tu rigs pa sil snyan stong 'dra ba// yid gnyis 'joms pa 'dod pa
34a1(mdo sde): rnams ni tshom byed pa/ / rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra skad tshim byed pa// yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lag mthun// chos kyi 'phreng ba yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa/
34a2(mdo sde): sil snyan dga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu nyams dga' ba// mi tsi ka la bing+ga khu byug ngur pa dang // rma bya ngang pa sgra snyan ku na la ka'i sgra// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra// ma 'khrul sdig med don
34a3(mdo sde): rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa/ / rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba// sku la 'dul ba 'gyur ba sbyong ba dgar 'gyur ba// gzhan gyi spyod dang mthun pa zhus na tshim byed pa// chos kyi dbang
34a4(mdo sde): phyug de yi gsung gi yan lag 'di/ / ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum// dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de yi bdun yang mtho// phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing zlum//
34a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba de yi sku ni btso ma'i gser gyi mdog/ ba spu g.yas su 'khyil cing gyen du re re skyes// lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta yi 'dra// rang byung e n+ya'i byin pa glang po'i sna 'dra'i bla// zhabs
34a6(mdo sde): mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo ba mtshan/ / glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros stabs seng ge'i rtsal gyi stabs// khyu mchog bsgyings pa'i stabs can dbang po'i mchod sdong rgyas/
34a7(mdo sde): mkha' las me tog char babs me tog gdugs su gyur// gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de yi rmad byung chos// rgyal ba rnyed dang ma rnyed bde dang sdug bsngal dang // grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstod
34b1(mdo sde): dang smad pa yis/ / pad+ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med// mi yi seng ge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis
34b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas/ tshom zhing mgul yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// yul 'khor
34b3(mdo sde): skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang / de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / de mngon sum du byas
34b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang / de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / ji ltar 'khor yang ba dang phrad pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi
34b5(mdo sde): gzo ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyi bag med pa spangs pa dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun gnag/
34b6(mdo sde): rmongs pa dang / ji ltar 'du byed rnams tshogs par dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems gdul dka' ba dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mched drug dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang //
34b7(mdo sde): ji ltar reg pa yongs su ma shes te/ sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang / ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar sred pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung bar dka'
35a1(mdo sde): ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na/ skye ba rgyun gcad dka' ba dang / ji ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / ji ltar
35a2(mdo sde): nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'tsho ba rjes su mi srun pa dang / ji ltar 'jug pa'i ro bro ba chung ba dang / ji ltar srid pa mngon par 'grub pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin
35a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di mi nus te/ 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pas rmongs pa/ sems tha ba can/ bag med pa la dga' ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/ tshul
35a4(mdo sde): bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba la chags pa'o sems dang ldan pa/ skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pas ni/ bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par sbyang bar mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag
35a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo/ / de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sgo nas byung na ni/ nye du'i chog kyis bar chad byas su 'ong gis
35a6(mdo sde): bdag khang steng 'di nas thur du mchod ngo snyam mo/ / yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo dag la ba de logs su phyogs te/
35a7(mdo sde): khang pa de nas mchongs nas chog 'di skad du/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing / thams cad gzigs she na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes kyang
35b1(mdo sde): smras so/ / yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'od phyung nas/ 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod
35b2(mdo sde): nams kyi 'od zer la reg go/ 'od de las kyang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya stong pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ste/ snang ba chen por gyur nas/ snang ba
35b3(mdo sde): des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to/ / yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad+ma de la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
35b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum ched du brjod do// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin
35b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa don grub blongs 'od de brdud pa dang / gzhon nu de sdong po bcad pa skyel ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal
35b6(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la tshogs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas 'dod/
35b7(mdo sde): tshegs ches sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do// ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas ni// bdag gis thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol// 'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa ni// mtshan
36a1(mdo sde): mo bar snang lha las thos lags te/ / thos nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na// mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu// lam nyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig/ ljongs
36a2(mdo sde): par gyur pa'i mig tu der gyur cig/ dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan// g.yangs chen po 'di las bdag phyung zhig/ dbul po gyur pa dag ni bsdu bar mdzod// mgon po bcings
36a3(mdo sde): pa bdag ni deng sgrol mdzod/ / som nyi bcos pa'i yid gnyis bcad du gsol// byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston// chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol// mun pa bdag la
36a4(mdo sde): sgron ma mdzad du gsol/ / rmar gyur padag la rma med mdzad du gsol// sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gizug rngu phyung // khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzod// srid par dmigs pa
36a5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa gcad du gsol/ / yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam tshan gyis// mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol// srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung // dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung
36a6(mdo sde): ba ste/ / bsod nams rnam smin ring por mo thogs 'grub// bdag gis dal ba gdod rnyed cig nges gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa
36a7(mdo sde): mchog spyad na/ / 'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las thar 'gyur ba// 'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos// rgyal bu gzhon nu
36b1(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ de thos nas rnam par
36b2(mdo sde): thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo/ / mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste/ de nam mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor/ mngon par gtor
36b3(mdo sde): to/ / yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par
36b4(mdo sde): bstod pa/ / mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'o zhal// gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis// mnyam med mkhyen can khyod la phyag
36b5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang // khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di na ri rgyal bzhin// gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// thub pa khyod kyi smin mtsham
36b6(mdo sde): mdzod spu mdzes/ / kun dazla ba kha ba dung ltar dkar// thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa// spyan mchog bzang po ut+pal sngon po 'dra// rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo//
36b7(mdo sde): ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba// de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs// chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 'jam skum gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
37a1(mdo sde): tshems bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra// bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba// 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// bden gtam snyan pa khyod la
37a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ / rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis// 'od kyis zhing brgyad dag kyang snang bar bgyid// 'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag/ bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis zil du
37a3(mdo sde): rAg/ e n+ya'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das// glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs// bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs// sa dang ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad//
37a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis rgyas pa ste// khyod kyi pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra// 'gro ba gzugs 'di blta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan
37a5(mdo sde): khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad/ / khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes// sems can kun la thug rje byams thugs ldan// mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni
37a6(mdo sde): sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes/ / khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan// khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'// mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni
37a7(mdo sde): smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'jom/ / khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs// khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa sku gsung thugs
37b1(mdo sde): ni rnam par dag/ pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos// khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la bing+ka'i skad// sid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang // gar la
37b2(mdo sde): lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang / / bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med// chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen// stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul// ma shes pas ni 'gro ba 'khyam 'gyur te/
37b3(mdo sde): thugs rje thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis// de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags// 'dod chags la sogs nad mang brgya dag gis// skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te// bde
37b4(mdo sde): gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing / / zla med sman pa lta bu rnam par rgyu// skye dang rga dang 'cha dang mya ngan non// sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas// rtag tu na pa'i 'gro ba
37b5(mdo sde): gzigs nas ni/ / thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su// 'gro kun shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor// glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis mgon
37b6(mdo sde): ma mchis/ / de la lam gyi dam pa ston pa mdzad// gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa// 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyis// chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rgyal ba de
37b7(mdo sde): ngag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/ / 'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong ba'i mchog/ tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa// dri za mi tsi lha yi bu mo mchog/ sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gdung ba mdzad
38a1(mdo sde): bden dang drang ba mi bzad thabs tshul gyis/ / yongs spyad yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung // de thos sems can khrag khrig phra brgya dag/ theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi
38a2(mdo sde): bapar bgyid/ / khyod la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni// rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mo yis thob// mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa// phyug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por 'gyur// mtshungs med khyod la
38a3(mdo sde): dad pa skyed pa ni/ / gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba'i mchog/ 'gro la dge ba bcu po kun 'byed pa// rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni//
38a4(mdo sde): tshangs po brgya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang // yongs su dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dag/ gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams mang sel mdzad pa/
38a5(mdo sde): mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang // thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te// gnas mchog rga shi med pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa//
38a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog/ bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam// bde ba zhi pa rdul dang bral la 'god// bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i//
38a7(mdo sde): bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te// byang chub dam pa ma thob par du ni// bskal pa bye ba mang por bas mi 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa// yongs su dag cing mdzes pa
38b1(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur/ / dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis// sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs// yon tan rnam pa du ma 'thob par 'gyur//
38b2(mdo sde): mtho ras thar pa mi yi bde ba dang // 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur// khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis// rgyal ba khyod kyi
38b3(mdo sde): bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba ni/ / bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs// rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa// mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa// bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhi dgyes
38b4(mdo sde): pa/ / mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas// mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkhas la gnas// dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag 'gyur te/
38b5(mdo sde): dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye// lha dang me dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs// yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas// bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa 'dis// 'gro bsang
38b6(mdo sde): rgyas go 'phang thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas mtshan mo de'i nam nangs pa dang // rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi 'khor du ba'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar ring
38b7(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs kyis grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyed ci'i phyir du/ de dag gis smras pa// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad du'o//
39a1(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu'i phyir/ shing bcad pa skyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel te/ langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal to// yul 'khor
39a2(mdo sde): skyong de nas grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang // bsnyen/
39a3(mdo sde): bkur bya ba'i phyir/ shar phyogs logs su song ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i phyir/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya cu rtsa
39a4(mdo sde): bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar gyi phyogs cha ga la ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
39a5(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ srid
39a6(mdo sde): gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis/ / sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur/ skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpal la
39a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ / rgyal ba khyod sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag/ lhun po rin chen mchog gis spras ltar yongs su dag/ rgyal bsdug cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra// blta sdug gzugs
39b1(mdo sde): mnga' thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stang mdzad// sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam gyis mi
39b2(mdo sde): khyab mdzad/ / ngas na khyod su bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang // bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam btan thabs kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs//
39b3(mdo sde): khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags// chu shel nor bu klog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags// 'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi ba'i gzugs kyang ston// chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba
39b4(mdo sde): lags/ / rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'// bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yi tshad ni gda' ma lags// khyod ni dga' ldan 'ga' zhig na yang bzhugs par gda'// 'chi 'pho
39b5(mdo sde): mdzad cing rab dkar glang por gyur nas ni/ / dpa' bo sum gyi lhums su gshegs par gda' bar mdzad// thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs// bcom ldan phyogs gar ba
39b6(mdo sde): pabar ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste/ / sa 'ga' ngag tu gom pa bdun 'dor gda' ba mdzad// nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin tu lha// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung yang phyung // thub
39b7(mdo sde): khyod chos gang la yang the tsom mi mnga' yang / / yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhing brnyes gyur kyang // kha cig tu ni bud med nang na bzhugs par
40a1(mdo sde): dga'/ / yab dang yum dang sras dang bud med rnams kyang btang // gnyen rnam mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing du// sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lhas yongs bskor nas// nags
40a2(mdo sde): gnas gcig po 'byung bar gda' ba'ang mdzad/ / khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang // zhing na bdud 'dul bar yang gda' ba ston par mdzad// sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab
40a3(mdo sde): yongs bskor kyang / / khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad// rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// mya ngan bzla zhes 'khor gyi nang du chog tu gsungs// rtag tu
40a4(mdo sde): 'khor bar gda' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni/ / khyod ni zhi ba bsil gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung // khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med// thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas
40a5(mdo sde): par 'gengs/ / phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung // kun tu spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// sems
40a6(mdo sde): can kun gyi bgyi bar sgyu ma ltar gda' yang / / thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa'am byon ma lags// sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog
40a7(mdo sde): thob pa/ / lam mchog mi yi dpa' bo khyod legs gsung // bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas// mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi// mi yi dpa' bo thub pa kun
40b1(mdo sde): mkhyen rims bral ba/ / srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchi lhag pa ga la zhig/ bdag gis 'dir bstod bsod nams mtha' yas gang bsgrubs des// 'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog/
40b2(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
40b3(mdo sde): ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to/ / yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshesas pa don grub blod la 'di skad ces gsol to//
40b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ cang mi
40b5(mdo sde): gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / / yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ pham de gnyis dang / grog de dag dang / bud med de dag la smras pa khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig
40b6(mdo sde): ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te/ ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig/ de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon
40b7(mdo sde): nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis ci nas gror khyer dga' mchog brgyan te/ ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// ro bro ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gsheg pa dge slong gi
41a1(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to/ / dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chags bshams pa/
41a2(mdo sde): steng du rin po che'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs pa yongs su grub par byas pa/ me tog pad+ma dkar po'i rdzong gos mdzes par byas pa/ ras bcos bu mu gnyis
41a3(mdo sde): dri ma med pa/ / brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams pa/ dge slong re re la gos kha na ma tho ba med pa gang byin pa de phyi nyin mi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas so// de lo
41a4(mdo sde): bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir/ gzhan yid la ma byas so// bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog
41a5(mdo sde): pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te/ lus dang srog la yang mi bstan/ dngos po gzhan lta smos kyang
41a6(mdo sde): ci dgos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la de lan gnyis su ma zhus so// bar skabs der khrus ma byas/ 'bru mar gyis
41a7(mdo sde): lus ma bskus/ rkang pa ma bskus/ ngal ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed de/ zan za ba dang / bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to// gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya
41b1(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhen pa byas so// gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang // 'phreng
41b2(mdo sde): ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas/ rgyu dang rkyen thams cad bsogs te/ phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhi'i
41b3(mdo sde): bar du byas so/ / mchod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dri bas g.yogs so// mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag bres so// mchod rten re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul
41b4(mdo sde): lo/ / mchod rten thams cad la sil snyan brgya stong phul lo// 'dzam bu gling khor yug tu me tog gi shing ljon pa bskrun to// mchod rten re re la yang mar me'i rdza po brgya stong nas mar me bus so// mar me
41b5(mdo sde): rdza bo re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mar drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gi mar me bus so/ / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod par byas so// tshul de lta bus yo bya ba'i bar du mchod pa byas
41b6(mdo sde): te/ phyis rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas/ chos gos gsum par gyur cing / rtag tu bsod snyoms spyod pa dang / rtag tu cog pu pa ste/ nam yang blos ma phab bo// nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par
41b7(mdo sde): ma gyur to/ / de zang zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bye ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin te/ des gzhan la tha na legs so zhes bya ba tsam la yang re bar ma gyur na/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos
42a1(mdo sde): de chos nyan pa 'am/ chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to// de la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do// yul gyi mi thams cad dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / nang mi thams cad dang //
42a2(mdo sde): grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rjes su bslabs te rab tu byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi rjes su slob cing / yul gyi mi
42a3(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu byung gis/ bdag cag gis de la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byas nas/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das
42a4(mdo sde): nas kyang / dam pa'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te/ dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis thams cad yongs su bzung ngo // tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag
42a5(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa bzhi la rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/ / yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsom za 'am
42a6(mdo sde): yod gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong
42a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsom za 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi
42b1(mdo sde): blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ces bya bar gyur to// grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs par gyur to//
42b2(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa dang /
42b3(mdo sde): sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su spangs pa dang / bag yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// ngas bya dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus bla na med pa yang
42b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ / de lta bas na de dag mi brtson pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshogs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang / shes kyi le la chags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis bcom
42b5(mdo sde): pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs pa dag sha thang ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang / dge sbyong sun par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dang / lus dang / ngag
42b6(mdo sde): dang sems mi drang ba dang / ltas lta ba dang / khas 'che ba nor ba dang / rang gis dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i ched kyi sman dang / yo byad kyi
42b7(mdo sde): mtshan ma la chags pa dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa dang / cho gas nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod yul dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ri
43a1(mdo sde): du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos
43a2(mdo sde): nas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rigs pa med pa/ rnyed pa don du gnyer ba dang / mi bsten pa shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// stobs bcu
43a3(mdo sde): mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag med na/ / snying ni 'thob dang shes kyi khe la song // byang chub yon tan brgyas khebs bor nas ni// de dag 'thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'// khwa 'dra sdang ba khrel dang mos blo bral//
43a4(mdo sde): shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song // nyon mongs rag lus srid pa'i 'gro bar gzhol// bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhes de skad smra// lus ni dgon na dran pa grong khyer du// 'thob phyir de dag rnam par
43a5(mdo sde): rtog pas spyod/ / gnam dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste// de 'dra'i de dag sbrul ltar ring du spang // de dag sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun yon tan brgyas gang dga' ma yin// mtho ris por
43a6(mdo sde): nas ngan pa'i lam du song / / sdug pas 'phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro bar 'khyams// nga yi spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas// yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub pas 'di la sbyor// bskal pa bye
43a7(mdo sde): ba mang pos rnyed dka' dal rnyed kyis/ / de lta ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid 'dir brtson gyis// gang zhig theg mchog byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// de yis rgyal po de yi yon tan dran par bya// bsams
43b1(mdo sde): te yang dag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gnas par bya/ / de nas bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags med 'grub// yon tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la bsten// rang gis 'dir ni kun tu
43b2(mdo sde): ba bskyed par bya/ / bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dra ma spangs shig/ bI pa lta bur 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyams pa ste/ 'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya// der gnas nas ni bdag mi bsnyems shing
43b3(mdo sde): gzhan mi spong / / sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya mnyes ma byas// rjes su dran nas rtag par rgyun du bdag la spyod// lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spang bar bya// gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos
43b4(mdo sde): la brtson par gyis/ / nga yis mdo 'dir bsgrub pa bshad pa 'di gnas nas// de dag rnams kyis phyi nas byang chub rnyed mi dka'// gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa// thos nas phyir ying
43b5(mdo sde): ni 'jug par bya ba'i rigs/ / de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya// rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe na phyis 'gyod gyur ta re// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod
43b6(mdo sde): pa yang gang zhig bdag 'di bslab bo/ / bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis bsgrub na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gan na/
43b7(mdo sde): brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das
44a1(mdo sde): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrig phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
44a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams lnga sems rnam par grol
44a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar brgya/ de skad
44a4(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod
44a5(mdo sde): pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhi
44a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
44a7(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ne bar ma dang
44b1(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ sho la ka stong ste/ bam po gsum dang sho lo ka brgya/
44b2(mdo sde): / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ma hA pa ri nirbA Na ma hA yA na sU d+hu/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo/ dam po dang po/
44b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ku sha na/ chu klung gser ldan gyi 'gram gyad kyi nye
44b4(mdo sde): 'khor shing sA la zung gi tshal na bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan 'das dge slong bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad bcus bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpyid zla tha chung nya'i nang par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
44b5(mdo sde): dus dang nye bar gyur pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi rang rang gi yul gyi skad du// shin tu zur phyin par don brda sprod pa'i cho ga rnams kyis srid pa'i rtse mo man chad go bar mdzad de/ deng de bzhin gshegs
44b6(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse bo can/ 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa/ sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa/
44b7(mdo sde): skyabs chen po'i gnas dang gzhi por gyur pa/ thub pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// sems can thams cad kyi nub lung bstan pa tha ma la de lta bu'i gsung
45a1(mdo sde): rnams byung bar gyur to/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal nas 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang
45a2(mdo sde): shel gyi kha dog dang / rdo'i snying po'i kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can
45a3(mdo sde): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag la phog nas/ de'i mod la nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral te/ nyes sdig thams cad kyi rgyun
45a4(mdo sde): chad par gyur to/ / de nas mya ngan chen pos non te/ tshig mthun par kye ma khebs so khebs so zhes kyang 'dzer to// kyi hud kyi hud ces kyang skad cher 'bod cing / lag pa brkyang bas kyang mgo bo la rdob
45a5(mdo sde): par byed de/ 'dar zhing shin tu ngu'o// de'i tshe sa chen po nags tshal dang bcas/ ri dang bcas pa rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa yang rab tu g.yos te/ sems can de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'dzin
45a6(mdo sde): cing / 'di skad du/ grogs po dag rings/ gyad yul gyi grong khyer ku shar 'dod 'dong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs pa las
45a7(mdo sde): bzlog la/ bsgrim mi dgos par bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang bzhugs par gsol ba gdab bo zhes 'dzer to// gcig la gcig 'jus nas/ 'di skad du kye ma 'jig rten stong
45b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma sem+ba can rnams kyi bsod nam kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni zad do// las mi bzad par ni byung ngo // tshe dang ldan pa dag myur cig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag myur cig/
45b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng gi yud tsam 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par
45b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhug na/ bdag cag mgon med pa dang / rtsa lag med pa dang / 'phod par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhing / bdag cag gi the tsom dang / som nyi ci dang ci yod pa de dang de dag zhu bar bya'o zhes kyang
45b4(mdo sde): 'dzar to/ / nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang de na 'khod de/ 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan ka t+ya ya na chen po dang / gnas brtan pa ku la dang / gnas brtan nye dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan
45b5(mdo sde): ngag kyang de na 'khod de/ de dag la 'od zer gyis phog nas/ 'dar rab tu 'dar/ dam dam rab tu dam dam/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ brtags rab tu brtags/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur
45b6(mdo sde): 'khams rab tu 'khams/ rmugs rab tu rmugs/ rings rab tu rings te/ de la sogs pa dag tu gyur nas chas so// de'i tshe dge slong sa ya phrag brgyad so shing zos nas phyir byung ste/ gnas
45b7(mdo sde): brtan de dag la 'od zer gyi snang ba ngo phog nas/ shin tu rings par kha gdong bkrus te/ gcig la gcig 'jus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ dbang thob pa/
46a1(mdo sde): bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ cang shes pa/ gtso bo chen po/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa/ tsan dan chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa/ seng ge chen po/
46a2(mdo sde): bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa sha sta ga ste/ de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad snga dro nyim 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni ladra/
46a3(mdo sde): mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i
46a4(mdo sde): mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
46a5(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe ko ta ka'i bu mo rab bzang
46a6(mdo sde): ma la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ dbang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ gtso bo chen mo// chen po stong pa
46a7(mdo sde): nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ ko ta ka'i bu mo dge slong ma rab bzang ma dang / dge slong ma nye dga' mo dang / dge slong ma rgya mtsho blo gros dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum
46b1(mdo sde): phrag drug snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/
46b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du/ theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa
46b3(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum
46b4(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'khor de na dge slong ma 'khod pa rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog bcu thob pa sha
46b5(mdo sde): stag ste/ gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir bud med kyi gzugs dang / bud med kyi dbyibs dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa mang po dang / rus pa'i lus 'chang ba/ rtag tu tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa dang ldan pa//
46b6(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i don byed nus pa sha stag go// gzhan yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos byin la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams
46b7(mdo sde): cad kyang mi mchogs bcu thob pa/ thabs kyi lus 'chang ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtshos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros
47a1(mdo sde): mi zad pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod pa/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ theg pa chen pos
47a2(mdo sde): bkres pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag brgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o snyam ste/ sngon
47a3(mdo sde): kyi bskal pa bye ba snyed du tshul khrims kyi bgrod pa'i dam bca' ba legs par blangs pa 'dzin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin
47a4(mdo sde): du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam pa dang / go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa
47a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la snyoms par lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog
47a6(mdo sde): ltar rtsa dmar ba ni yangs/ mig ni mchim khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya bar
47a7(mdo sde): dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i chog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/
47b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod
47b2(mdo sde): do/ yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing / tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ dge bsnyen gang+gA'i klung
47b3(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang zung dang zung du shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / stong pa ma
47b4(mdo sde): yin pa dang / de kho na dang / de kho na ma yin pa dang / skyabs dang / skyabs ma yin pa dang / sems can dang / sems can med pa dang / brtan pa dang / brtan pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / zhi ba ma yin
47b5(mdo sde): pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / ther zug dang / ther zug ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i khyad
47b6(mdo sde): par dang / khyad par du 'phags pa shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen rab sbyin la sogs pa/ dge bsnyen
47b7(mdo sde): theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas shing / tshul khrims blangs pa/ theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas kyang / gzhan skom pa dag ngoms par
48a1(mdo sde): bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag brgal
48a2(mdo sde): nas gzhan bskal bar bya'o/ / bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ go cha
48a3(mdo sde): chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la sems gus pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bu gcog pa la bya ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha sta ga ste/ de dag kyang nyi
48a4(mdo sde): ma 'char kar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la zhen pa'i phyir/ re res kyang tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / thang shing gi mchog dang / tsan dan sa mchog pa'i bud shing rnams dang / yam sreg
48a5(mdo sde): shing dri bsung dang ldan pa/ yon tan lnga stong lnga stong khyer te 'odra so// de la yam sreg shing ska re zhing yang gser gyi skud pa rin po che sna bdun rigs bdun dang ldan pas spras pa dkris pas/ ri mo la bris pa kho
48a6(mdo sde): na bzhin du 'dug pa/ rang bzhin gyis gzhon sha can legs par bcos pa sha sta ga ste/ sna re zhing yang 'od rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phung po chen po/ mdog sngo ba dang / bar bar kha cig tu mdog
48a7(mdo sde): dkar/ kha cig tu sngo s+ya/ kha gcig tu rtsa dmar/ kha gcig tu ser ba/ mig tu sdug par byas pa sha stag go// bam po re re'i g.yogs ma'i phyar bu yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag go// cings
48b1(mdo sde): ma'i the gu mang po re re zhing yang / ldong ros kyi mdog lta bu dang / zar ma'o me tog gi mdog lta bu dang / sngon po dang / ser po rnams kyis bar bar du spel ba sha stag go/ de la chings ma'i the gu mang po re ra
48b2(mdo sde): zhing yang gser thags kyi mchog rnam par dag pa yul mang por grags pa dag gis spel ba sha stag go/ de la yam sreg shing sna re re zhing yang spos dri bsung zhim po dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang /
48b3(mdo sde): gur kum gyi phye ma dang ldan par byas pa/ gser thags kyis g.yogs pa/ dar snas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shu bas sngon po dang / ser po dang / sngo skya dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka
48b4(mdo sde): lta bu dag gi nang du bcug pa/ yul ka ling ka'i ras dang / zar ma'i ras dang / zab dar dang / rgya dar gyi mchog rnams kyis dkris pa/ me tog mang pos brgyan pa/ byug pa dri bsung zhim po dag gi
48b5(mdo sde): byugs pa sha stag go/ / yam sreg shing sA re'i shing rta re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyis mdzes par byas pa/ kha cig tu sngon po dang / dkar po dang / bab la'i kha dog dang
48b6(mdo sde): yaM khri'i kha dog pas lhag pa'i 'od gsal ba dang ldan pa sha stag go/ / shing rta de dag gi gnya' shing rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa dang / dpe med pa/ rta cang shes mgyog pa dag dang sbyar ba sha
48b7(mdo sde): stag go/ rta de dag kyang rlung gi shugs pas mgyogs pa/ spu kha chu skyar gyi mdog dang / ldong ros kyi mdog dang / sprin gyi mdog can sha stag ste/ thabs de 'dra ba'i shing rta re re'i mdun logs dang
49a1(mdo sde): rgyab logs dang / rgyab logs su rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ste/ rgyal mtshan thams cad kyang rin po che las byas pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag go// rgyal
49a2(mdo sde): mtshan gyi mdun logs su yang gdugs rtsibs dang / rtsa ba nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od can las byas pa/ mu tig gi chun po sbyangs pa sha stag khyer ro// gdugs re re'i mdun logs su yang gser gyi
49a3(mdo sde): me tog ku mu da dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dkar po sdong bu be DUR+Ya las byas/ ze ba rdo rje las byas pa/ bung ba mang po skad 'byin pa/ dri bsung zhim po dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ 'od dang ldan
49a4(mdo sde): pa che ba mang po sha stag dang / lda ldi chen po sha stag khyer ro// lnga ldi chen po rnams kyi mdun du yang byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa'i rabs kyi spyod pa ri mor bris pa chen po dag thogs so//
49a5(mdo sde): ri mo'i zur re re'i blo g.yas g.yon nas kyang / zlos gar gyi gar stabs yul dbus nas byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ gar stabs byed pa de'i nang na/ sil snyan rin po che las byas pa'i dza
49a6(mdo sde): rngadza dang / 'khar rnga dang / rnga zlum dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dag bdung zhing 'bud do// kar stabs kyi sil snyan de dag lba
49a7(mdo sde): kyang kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa brjod cing / gdung gdung skad du dbyangs len to// gar stabs kyi sil snyan re re'i mdun du yang me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs nas
49b1(mdo sde): par 'tsher ba rnams kyi phye mas rin po che'i skon bu legs par bcos pa gzhon sha can dag gis bkang ba sha stag dang / de ma yin pa'i skon bu mang po blta na sdug pa/ gur kum gyi phye mas bkang ba
49b2(mdo sde): mang po sha stag thogs so/ / de dag gi mdun du yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa khyab par 'gyur ba'i zhal zas dag khyer zhing 'dong ngo po// zhal zas de dag kyang bu da shing
49b3(mdo sde): tsan dan dmar po dang / a ka ru dang / thang shing gi me chung ngus btsos pa dang / gang+gA'i klung gi chus btsos pa sha stag ste/ skyur ba dang / lan tshwa'i ro dang / mngar ba dang / bska ba dang / tsha ba dang
49b4(mdo sde): kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa/ mdangs skyed pa/ phan par gyur pa sha stag go/ sA la zung gi drung gi nye 'khor thams cad kyang gser gyi bye ma 'jam pos bkram ste/ ga bu sha'i ras dang / snam bu dang
49b5(mdo sde): bcos snam dang / dre'u rngog dang / ka ling ka'i ras dang / za ba dar 'jam zhing mdog dkar ba rnams kyang bting ngo // grub pa'i gnas de'i bzhi dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis kho ra khor yug kyang gur
49b6(mdo sde): kum gyis byugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i seng ger khri chen po gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis spras shing snang bar byas pa/ ri rab ltar che zhing 'phang
49b7(mdo sde): mtho ba dag kyang babashams so/ / g.yog ma yang de dag gi rkyen du 'tsham pa sha stag gis g.yogs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka s+tha si li li 'khrol zhing gi sla 'byung ba'i dra ba can gyi yol ba rnams
50a1(mdo sde): kyis ni bskor/ rgya dang spu sdug yug khyim chen po'i bla re rnams ni brel/ gdugs dkar po rnams kyis ni nyi tshan bsgribs/ rnga yab dkar po rnams kyis ni g.yabs/ rgyab
50a2(mdo sde): rten glang po che'i mche ba la chu srin ma ka ra rten pa'i kha nas/ zla ba nya nga'i 'od zer ltar dkar ba'i mu tig gi chun po 'byung zhing sbyangs pa ldan pa rnams ni bcas/ sa phyogs rnams ni me tog dri zhim po'i sil sa/
50a3(mdo sde): mas gtor to// dge bsnyen de dag re re nas kyang 'di snyam 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin no// skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom sbyin no//
50a4(mdo sde): mgo bo dang mig la sogs pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin no// dbul po dang / bkren pa dang / 'phongs pa rnams la yang / 'dod pa dang / dug dang /
50a5(mdo sde): gnod pa dang / ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa rnams ma gtogs par/ gang dang gang dag ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag chog par sbyar ro snyam du sems kyi/ gzhan no ci yang mi sems so// de bzhin du dge
50a6(mdo sde): bsnyen gyi sde tshan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de dag thams cad kyi bsams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi bshos gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// de bzhin
50a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa bdag cag gi bya shos gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bya'o snyam ste/ so so nas de 'ba' zhig snying la sems shing / yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog
50b1(mdo sde): ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ rang rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad bud shing dang / yam sreg shing dang / shing rta dang /
50b2(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan rnams dang chas te/ zhal zas kyi mchog gis sbyar ba'i snod rnams thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
50b3(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / phye ma dang / phye ma zhi bu dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re rgya chen dag gis mchod nas/ lan
50b4(mdo sde): 'bum bskor ba byas te/ mig nas mchi ma rgyun mi 'chad par char bzhin du phab nas/ bdag nyid la sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po byed cing / kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par
50b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro zhes de skad du skad chen po 'don te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung na/ srog chags shi shu ma ra bzhin du 'gre ldeg cing / gsol ba 'debs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
50b6(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol bar ci gnang / gcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes
50b7(mdo sde): su gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen bzhin du cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du de skad ces gsol kyang
51a1(mdo sde): lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas dge bsnyen gyi tshogs de dag re thag chad de cang mi ser bar 'khod nas/ bu gcig pa shi nas dur khrod du
51a2(mdo sde): bor ma thag pa'i pha ma 'gre ldog pa bzhin du shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ / de bzhin du dge bsnyen de dag thams cad mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa las langs te/ rang rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams
51a3(mdo sde): bsdus nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi gces pa 'dzin
51a4(mdo sde): pa'i dge bsnyen mtshong dpon gyi bu mo 'tsho ba'i dpal la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang / bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can bye ba phrag mang po nges par sgrol ba/ khyim gyi
51a5(mdo sde): gnas la smod pa sha stag ste/ yus 'di ni nyes pa'i khams brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las lhags pas bsdus pa'o// lus 'di ni srin bu'i rigs bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i zas so// lus 'di ni rgyal po'i khri mon du
51a6(mdo sde): brubs pa'i dri mnam pa'o/ / lus 'di ni khyi ro rul ba'i dri bas kyang lhag par spags pa'o// lus 'di ni sgo dgu nas mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa'o// lus 'di ni sha dang / chu ba dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang /
51a7(mdo sde): pags pa zhal zhal can/ rkang lag gi phyi sgo dang / ra ba dang / ba gam dang / mig gi skar khung dang / mgo bo'i yang thog can/ yid rgyal po lta bu'i pho brang grong khyer lta bu'o// lus 'di ni mkhas
51b1(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis spangs shing / byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i 'dod chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ba snyed kyi srin bus bsten pa/ 'dam bu dang / e
51b2(mdo sde): ran da dang / dbu pa dang / chu shing lta bur snying po med pa/ glog dang ri gzar po'i 'dab chu'i dba' rlab sa ltar shin tu mi brtan pa'o// sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / zla ba'i gzugs
51b3(mdo sde): brnyan ltar slu bar byed pa/ rlung shugs drag pos rnam par dkrugs pa'i chu'i shugs kyis brkos pa'i 'gram gyi sdong po ltar g.yangs na 'dug pa'i chos can/ spyang ki dang / wa dang / bya
51b4(mdo sde): rgod dang / bya rog rnams kyi zas yin na/ su zhig 'di lta bu tshang ba la dga' bar byed/ rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad sbra'i rtse mos blangs te ba glang gi rmig rjes su blugs par mi nus srid kyi/ lus nad
51b5(mdo sde): brgya rtsa bzhis gzir ba 'di snying po med pa dang / mi gtsang ba ni tshig tsam gyis bstan par mi nus so// sa chen po 'di rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i rus pa'i 'bru tsam sha stag tu byas pa 'am/ yungs 'bru
51b6(mdo sde): tsam mam/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul tsam sha stag tu byas pas ni zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ lus 'di yod kyi bar du 'di'i nyes dmigs ni mthar thug par mi 'gyur te/ de bas na dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i
51b7(mdo sde): phyir 'di mchil ma bzhin du dor bar bya'o snyam ste/ 'di ltar dge bsnyen ma dag thams cad chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sngon pa med pa bsgoms pas sems bsgoms pa sha stag s+ho/
52a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma 'tsho ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen ma dpal 'phreng zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyernams gzhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen
52a2(mdo sde): po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ bsrung ba lhur len pa/ bud med kyi lus ngan no snyam du smod pa dang / lus snying po med do snyam du smod pa/ so so//
52a3(mdo sde): nas shas cher sgom pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gzhig go snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas gzhan skom pa dag ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po la
52a4(mdo sde): sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa// 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par slob par 'dod pa dang / grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// brgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi

52a6(mdo sde): ma dang ldan pa dang / bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar shin tu rings par gcig la gcig 'jus te/ de bzhin gshegs
52a7(mdo sde): pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/ yam sreg shing dge bsnyen pa rnams kyi nyis 'gyur khyer ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ bu shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal
52b1(mdo sde): par gyur te/ ngus nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe li tsa byi gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po la sogs pa yangs pa can na gnas pa'i li tsa byi gzhon
52b2(mdo sde): nu grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa dang bcas pa rnams/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i rgyal phran blon po dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos

52b4(mdo sde): 'di lta bur 'dod de/ bdag cag gi nor dang 'bru'i tshogs dang / mdzod dang bang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni/ bdud rtsi mi zad par bya ba dang / bdud rtsi gnas par bya ba'i phyir yin gyis/

52b6(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa rnams ni gos dkar po gyon du bcug ste/ khyim pa'i las byed du gzhug go snyam du sems brtul ba/ dam pa'i chos skyugs pa la ni bla ma bzhin du rim gror bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ dge
52b7(mdo sde): 'dun la phan pa dang bde bar gnas par bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs par byas tang des chog go snyam du sems pa dang / theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du yi dam
53a1(mdo sde): bcas pa la brtan pa dang / de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ yi tsa byi gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sgrib pa
53a2(mdo sde): dag pa zhes bya ba dang / gang+gA'i chu dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa'i lo tsa byi gzhon nu de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'jus te/ re res kyang gdug zhugs la zhen pa'i bud shing thang shing gi
53a3(mdo sde): mchog dang / tsan dan dang / a ka ru rnams dang / yam sreg shing bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur rnams khyer nas/ mchod pa rnams pa sbags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tha/
53a4(mdo sde): du dong ngo // li tse byi gzhon nu re re la yang glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / nor bu chu shel brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chas so// glang po che re re'i mdu/
53a5(mdo sde): du yang che ba la 'os pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / pa dan dang / dar gyi bla re chen po rnams thogs so// gdugs rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod
53a6(mdo sde): do/ / dar gyi bla re chen po rnams kyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pa de la yang chu zheng du dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do// rgyal mtshan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang 'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod do//
53a7(mdo sde): ba dan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa des kyang dpag tshad stong du phyin to// de ltar de dag mchod pa rnams dang chas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
53b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas phul ba las/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ste/ ma bzhes nas/ mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te re thag chad nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun gyi srid
53b2(mdo sde): tsam du 'phags te 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling pa'i blon po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la dad pa/ tshul khrim
53b3(mdo sde): dang / cho ga dang / yon tan rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag gi rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang
53b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba skyong zhes bya ba dang / chos skyong zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa dag kyang de'i tshe der lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi mchod pas/ mchod pa snga ma rnams zil gyis mnan nas//
53b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod nas/ zhal zas ma bzhes pa'i phyir mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la
53b6(mdo sde): bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs par/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po// grong khyer gyi nang na
53b7(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang / ri khrod kyi grong dang / yul po che dang / kha lungs kyi rgyal po
54a1(mdo sde): @gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so/ / rgyal po de rnams re re la yang dmag 'khrugs ya phrag bco brgyad bco brgya/
54a2(mdo sde): yod do// de dag la glang po che rtag tu 'gram pa nas rdul 'dzag pa dang / rta rlung gi shugs pas lhag par mgyogs pa dag kyang yod do// de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad gang yin pa de dag kyang / mchod pa'i ye
54a3(mdo sde): byad snga ma de dag las nyis 'gyur gyis ches bzang la ches mang ste/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i phul dag khyer nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so// de dag mchod pa de rnams kyi nang na
54a4(mdo sde): gdugs thung ngu gang yin pa de yang dpag tshad brgyad cu chu zheng ga ba par 'dug go/ / ba dan gyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pas kyang dpag tshad brgya stong du phyin no// rgyal mtshan phal pa gang yin pa de la yang 'phang
54a5(mdo sde): du dpag tshad sum cu yod do/ / de ltar yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri med pa'i snying po dang / nyi 'od ces bya ba dang / de la sogs pa rgyal po rnams nyi ma 'char kar lhags te/ de dag kyang dam pa'i chos
54a6(mdo sde): sun 'byin cing rtags cad 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ mthus kyang sems can rnams dam pa'i chos la 'god par byed pa dang / bdag cag gi nor dang 'bru'i tshogs dang / mdzod dang
54a7(mdo sde): bang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o// dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi lce
54b1(mdo sde): ni drung nas bcad do zhes dam bcas pa brtan por byas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse ba sha stag ste/ de dag gi mchod pa rnams kyis yangs pa can
54b2(mdo sde): nas grong khyer ku sha'i bar thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur to/ / de dag gi gdugs kyi grib ma 'dab chags su 'dug pas ni/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi phog go// de dag gi kha zas kyi dri ba srung gis ni dpag tshad
54b3(mdo sde): bzhir khyab gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gis sbyar ba'i zhal zas bzhes par lan gsum gyi bar du gsol pa btab kyang / zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ langs nas
54b4(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo ma gtogs par/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma la sogs pa
54b5(mdo sde): 'dzam bu gling ba'i rgyal po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi chung ma gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can mang po
54b6(mdo sde): nges par sgrol ba/ rtag tu lus bsgom pa dang ldan pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas sems rnam par dag pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i
54b7(mdo sde): btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo pri yang ku zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/
55a1(mdo sde): gcig la gcig 'jus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la zhen pa'i phyir/ yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ mchod pa snga ma thams cad rang rang gi mchod pa rnams
55a2(mdo sde): kyis zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nyis 'gyur du mchod pa byas te/ de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs rnams kyi 'phang dang / chu zheng gi tshad kyang
55a3(mdo sde): snga ma'i nyis 'gyur pas lhag go/ / kha zas rnams kyi dri bsung can ni dpag tshad brgyad du khyab par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / zhal
55a4(mdo sde): zas ma bzhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor bar byed cing / sgra 'bal la/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams 'thor zhing / skad mi snyan pas ngus te/ bu gcig pa shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar
55a5(mdo sde): gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sA la zung gi drung nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mig yangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha'i tshogs gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye
55a6(mdo sde): ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags nas/ lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag ltos/ grogs po dag ltos/ mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byad mchog tu khyad par du 'phags la/ de bzhin
55a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang bkur sti thams mchod par 'dod de/ mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi tha ma bzhes pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
55b1(mdo sde): 'debs kyis/ grogs po dag bdag cag gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya zhing / tha ma'i dus su zhal zas dbul bar bya na/
55b2(mdo sde): de wAr bdag cag gis phul ba'i nas zas de bzhin gshegs pas gams te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par mdzad cig kra/ grogs pa dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba na shin tu dgan no//
55b3(mdo sde): de bas kyang zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni ches dkon no// kye ma bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na ni/ 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes smras so//
55b4(mdo sde): lha de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan to snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen pos skom pa/ ngoms nA kyang gzhan skom pa rnams ngoms par bya'o/
55b5(mdo sde): snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ theg pa chen po la phrag dog dang / dus che ba dang / 'chab pa dang / sgyu med pa/ theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams kyi ser ba
55b6(mdo sde): lta bur gyur pa/ dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i tshul khrims blang ba/ 'jig rten dang mthun par slob par 'dod pa/ bdag cag brgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o//
55b7(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon
56a1(mdo sde): tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la snying rje lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gdung
56a2(mdo sde): zhugs la zhen pa'i phyir/ bud shing dang yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ de dag kyang snga mas phul ba'i yam sreg shing gi nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur ba'i bzang ba'i lha rdzas dri bsung dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba mi la
56a3(mdo sde): dkon pa sha stag go/ shing rta yang rta'i mchog mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba/ dar la dkar pos g.yogs pa/ gzugs dang dbyibs ri mor bri bar mi nus pa/ dril bu g.yer kha 'i dra can gyi yol bas bskor ba/
56a4(mdo sde): dar yug khyim chen po'i bla re rgya chen po// rtsa ba ri mo can dag la btsugs pa dang / gar stabs dang / rol mo yid 'ong ba rnams kyis mdun du drangs pa/ kha zas zhim po mang po dag dang / seng ge'i khri bai DU R+Ya'i
56a5(mdo sde): rgyab rten rtse mo nor bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ zhabs rten gser las byas pa dag kyang ba sham+ba pa dang / sa phyogs kyang me tog dri bsung zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas la/ me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing
56a6(mdo sde): bkod pa/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi phyi bzhin 'brang ba sha stag ste/ so so nas mchi ma khrag lta bu mi thub cing / mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdungs nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang /
56a7(mdo sde): snying brtse ba'i phyir// gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
56b1(mdo sde): thad du dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mchod pa dang bkur sti'i mchog rnam pa mang po dag byas te/ bskor ba yang byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams

56b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan bla da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes te/ cang mi
56b4(mdo sde): gsung na/ de dag re thag chad de langs nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhin gnas pa klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dga' bo dang / 1

58b7(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed sprin chen po dang / chu skyar rnams phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing glog 'gyu ba'i gseb nas rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar mdog sngo ba'i char gyi rgyun 'bab la/ 'brug sgra dal nas sgrogs pa'i sprin dang
59a1(mdo sde): ldan pas/ char zim bu bsil ba dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas ma bzhes nas re thag chad de/ de bzhin
59a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la zhen pa'i me gsad pa'i phyir nam mkha' nyid la 'khod do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po sgra can dang / lung btang mdog dang / sbrang rtsi'i mdog sel dang / 'dod
59a3(mdo sde): dgu'i spos ldan la sogs pa spos kyi glang po gang+gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/ gangs kyi sman dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang bu shing
59a4(mdo sde): rta chen po'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag dang / dgon pa chen po dag nas pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang / rdo gu s+tha tha dad pa dum dag sna'i thar tos phyung
59a5(mdo sde): zhing khyer te/ rlung gi shugs pas kyang ches mgyogs pa dang / shin tu rengs par dbyar gyi 'brug sgra bzhin du sgrogs shing lhags nas/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma bcer ba'i seng ge'i khri'i lda ldi dag bshams te/ bcom
59a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ zhal zas ma bzhes pas re thag chad de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe seng ge seng ge'i sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa seng ge gang+gA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma
