255b2(mdo sde): kyi khams der phyin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni
255b3(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de/ snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can
255b4(mdo sde): ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs
255b5(mdo sde): par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang yongs su ldan par byas nas/ chos
255b6(mdo sde): kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam du btab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas
255b7(mdo sde): khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub
256a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re'adrang 'khor byang chub
256a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der spong ngo // de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten
256a3(mdo sde): gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen pos kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po'ang char bzhin du phab bo//
256a4(mdo sde): 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang
256a5(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang las ma bkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/ zhabs la mgo bos
256a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa
256a7(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyi zla mar me'i 'od ces bya ba de
256b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med
256b2(mdo sde): pa ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai DUR+Ya las byas pa/ gser bco
256b3(mdo sde): mas thig re'ur bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ya la ga dang / 'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa
256b4(mdo sde): rlung mi drag pras bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de dag so so'i skye bres thos pas mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/ yon tan brgyad
256b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing / rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang / pun+d+ha ri ka dang / pa ri shA ka dang
256b6(mdo sde): de ma yin pa me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam chu'i steng yongs su kheb sa te/ chu'i nang na'ang bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du
256b7(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/ / rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do// rin po che'i shing gi bar bar ni seng ge'i khri
257a1(mdo sde): mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas/ rin po re sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'phrul pa
257a2(mdo sde): lha rdzas kyi me tog gis chal par bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mar me'i 'od skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed/
257a3(mdo sde): mdun du bdar te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon
257a4(mdo sde): po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/ rab tu gsal ba/ dper mi bzod pa 'di shar phyogs logs su 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang
257a5(mdo sde): la 'od kyis reg pa thams cad lus dang sems bde bar gyur pa/ / thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal
257a6(mdo sde): to/ rigs kyi bu legs par nyon la shin tu yid la legs par zung zhig dang / khyed la dgrol bar bshad par bya'o// 'di nas shwar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag
257a7(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
257b1(mdo sde): rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya
257b2(mdo sde): ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad la thab snga mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi
257b3(mdo sde): phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsad nas 'don pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan
257b4(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing / sangs rgyas kyi drin
257b5(mdo sde): lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo dag pa ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod
257b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/ / de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu skyed stan las langs te/ glegs phyogs
257b7(mdo sde): gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi
258a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa rnon po sangs rgyas drin ldan bas pa
258a2(mdo sde): pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi
258a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas
258a4(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de/ snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na
258a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang / shrang shong dang / gyo me dang / gseg ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ mtshams med pa lnga/
258a6(mdo sde): dang mi dge ba bcu rdzogs pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas// chos
258a7(mdo sde): kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nges thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/
258b1(mdo sde): khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der byin nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub
258b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re 'dra 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
258b3(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams pa dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu
258b4(mdo sde): g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po'ang kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po'ang char bzhin phab bo// 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing //
258b5(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang lam dkrol bar rang zer
258b6(mdo sde): bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas
258b7(mdo sde): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig lnga brgya
259a1(mdo sde): 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang phyug grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sdang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas pad+mo le brgan gyi 'od ces bya
259a2(mdo sde): ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur
259a3(mdo sde): pa/ bla na med pa/ ston brgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai DUR+Ya las byas
259a4(mdo sde): pa/ gser bcoms thig re'ur dres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab mas shin
259a5(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de'ang so so'i skye bos thos na mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod pa/ yon
259a6(mdo sde): tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing / rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang / pran+da ri ka dang / pa ri sha ka
259a7(mdo sde): dang / de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i 'bang lo tsam chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu'i nang na bya sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra
259b1(mdo sde): snyan pa 'byin to/ / rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do// rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad dpag
259b2(mdo sde): tshang gcig pa bshams nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/ lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gis chal par bkram
259b3(mdo sde): pa'i khri'i thog na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo le brgan gyi 'od rlugs pa skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong skad bdun du bdar te/ thal
259b4(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang / ser po /
259b5(mdo sde): dang dmar po dang / dkar po ldan pa// rab tu gsal ba/ dper mi bzod pa 'di lho phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad
259b6(mdo sde): lus dang sems bde bar gyur pa/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag legs
259b7(mdo sde): par nyon la shin tu yid la legs par zung zhig dang / khyed la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o// 'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha
260a1(mdo sde): rol naka/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod do// de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
260a2(mdo sde): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos
260a3(mdo sde): yongs su bskor nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi
260a4(mdo sde): zug rngu rtsad nas 'don pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg
260a5(mdo sde): pa gcig la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing / sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i
260a6(mdo sde): byiphyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir/ skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no// de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems
260a7(mdo sde): dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs par gyur nas/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
260b1(mdo sde): 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang /
260b2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin ldan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des/ byang chub sems
260b3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu dgra khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang /
260b4(mdo sde): shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad pas/ snying
260b5(mdo sde): rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ / gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tshor ma la sogs pa
260b6(mdo sde): yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyad pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don
260b7(mdo sde): du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces sman
261a1(mdo sde): @#/ lam btab bo// sangs rgyas des thog ma de skad ces spon lam btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nus/ de ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs
261a2(mdo sde): rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sem dpa' de dag thams cad kyis rig mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang
261a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag re re'ang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ba der song ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du
261a4(mdo sde): byiphyin par 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po'ang kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po'ang char bzhin du phab
261a5(mdo sde): po/ 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang g.yos so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng
261a6(mdo sde): gi bar snang lam dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bya rgod spungs pa'i rig la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
261a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
261b1(mdo sde): chen po thams cad kyis so so nas 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ mchod pa dang bkur sti byas/ mnod pa byas nas/ thams cad kyis mgrin
261b2(mdo sde): gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bstod do/ / de ltar sangs rgyas la bstod nas kyang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yongs su
261b3(mdo sde): dag par gyur te/ ri khrang khrod dang / ri chen po dang / chung ngu dang / gtsang po dang / chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka dang / shang shong dang / ngam grog dag med cing / de na gnas pa'i
261b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/ sangs rgyas gang na der lhags nas dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mig ni 'dzums par
261b5(mdo sde): chags pa'i yid kyis lta zhing 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer phyir 'dus par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dag gis sku la lan bdun bskor nas// dbu'i spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur te// de ltar gyur pa kun
261b6(mdo sde): dga' bos mthong nas/ 'khor mang po thams cad kyang the tsom skyes par sems kyis rab tu shes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thabs mkhas pa mngon par bstan pa dang / phyis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag
261b7(mdo sde): gi shes rab kyi mig dbye ba dang / so so'i skye bo thams cad sred pa'i chu klung las brgal zhing pha rol tu phyin pas bde ba la dgod pa dang / so so'i skye bo dag pa ma dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i drin lci ba dran zhing shes par
262a1(mdo sde): / bya ba'i byi ltar las rangs nasu/ gos chags su bcos nus gragos phyogs gcig khrus te/ bras mos la bcugs nas bral mo sbya ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'as la 'di skad ces gso/
262a2(mdo sde): to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs 'bring na mchis na 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste/ 'di la nges par dgongs po ni mnga' na/ 'khor mang po'i the tsom gyi dra ba bcad pa'i
262a3(mdo sde): slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol/ thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sdes// gleng bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gcig go//
262a4(mdo sde): / de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor mang po'i 'dus pa der rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i pad+mo'i sdong po dngul las byas/ 'dab ma ni gser las byas/ gzhi ni rin po che shel las byas pa
262a5(mdo sde): mu tig gi za bas kun tu brgyan pa gcig de nyid nas byung bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas/ pad+mo de la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so// de la bzhugs ma
262a6(mdo sde): thag tu yongs su dag pa'i sku mngon par bstan to/ / sku de las lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tshogs bstan/ lus kyi tshogs re re la'ang tha dad pa rnam pa khri brgyad stong snyed bstan to// gzugs rnam pa de re re
262a7(mdo sde): la'ang sku'i tshogs bstan/ rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs brgya stong snyed bstan/ sku'i tshogs de dag re re la'ang gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshags snyed bstan to// gang+ka'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed
262b1(mdo sde): kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la'ang gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan/ / rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i
262b2(mdo sde): tshogs bstan to/ / rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la'ang phyogs bcur phyogs rerare yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs bstan nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings
262b3(mdo sde): kyis klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed kyis sems can gyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan to// de'i ro de bzhin gshegs pas de snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par
262b4(mdo sde): bstan nas/ kun dga' bo dang phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag
262b5(mdo sde): de de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i tshig gang yin pa de bka' stsal bar bya'o/ / chos la rlig tu brjod pa med mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs mkha
262b6(mdo sde): pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma dang ming med pa'i chos la ming dang mtshan mar bstan par bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thog mar skyes shing 'khor ba'i tshe/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul
262b7(mdo sde): phra rab snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa de dag thams cad rdzogs par myong ste/ de ltar lus kyi tshogs de dag kun myong bas na/ sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha mar ma gyur pa
263a1(mdo sde): med/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can de dag gi pha mar ma gyur pa med de/ 'amar gyur pa thams cad kyi phyir rgyun du shin tu spyang dka' ba'ang spyad/ shin tu gtang dka' ba'i yan lag
263a2(mdo sde): gi dam pa mgo dang / mig dang / klang rgyas dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / rlung ma dang / pu pho dang / ba glang dang / rta dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta dang / theg pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / mal
263a3(mdo sde): cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad gang yang ma btang ba med do// shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa byas pa dang / mang du thos pa dang /
263a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / shes rab spyod pa nas/ spyod par dka' ba thams cad spyad de/ skyo ba dang ngal ba med cing / rgyun 'chad par brtson 'grus su 'bad pa'ang pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang / drin shes pa
263a5(mdo sde): dang drin lan bsab pa dang / sems can thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / de
263a6(mdo sde): ltar na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin chen po yod par shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / rtag par shin tu thabs
263a7(mdo sde): mkhas pas/ khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du mnyam snyoms pa'i byams pa bsgoms shing / btang snyoms dang
263b1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i thabs mkhas pa spyod de/ sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / chos stong pa nyid dang / phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtogs shing phyir mi nur ba dang / mi 'bying ba dang / mi rgod pa stong pa
263b2(mdo sde): nyid du yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la thabs mkhas pas bsgom par bya ba dang / theg pa gsum mi spong zhing kun chub par slob pa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ shin tu zab mo'i spyod yul dam pa spyad pa la thabs mkhas
263b3(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu gsal bar rtogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ros rnams thog ma dang tha ma'i bar du gcig ma yin par rtogs shing rlung pas/ so so'i skye bo dag ni myos shing bslang
263b4(mdo sde): pas/ gdung ba gsum gyis yongs su gdungs te/ sdug bsngal gyi mtsher nub par gyur to// phyin ci log bzhis bsgribs pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i ches la phyin ci log tu gyur to//
263b5(mdo sde): mi bden par kun tu rtogs pas bdag med pa la bdag tu lta/ mi rtag pa la rtag par lta/ mi bde ba la bde bar lta/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
263b6(mdo sde): na ba dang / 'chi bas gzir te/ skad cig tu mi rtag pas bsgribs pa lnga dang / kun nas grags pa bcus kun tu grags te/ srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing skye shi thog ma dang phra ma
263b7(mdo sde): med pa myong bar gyur te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang cir 'grothong pa bzhin sde snod gsum dang / mdo sde dgu nas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam por bya zhing bstan te/
264a1(mdo sde): so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang po gsungs so// tshig la chags pa kha cig bdag mi 'di kho nas chog ste mya ngan las 'das pa thog ces 'dzin pa'ang yod do//
264a2(mdo sde): de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i smon lam gyi shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na las mthun pa thams cad bsdus so// de ltar las mthun
264a3(mdo sde): ba kun 'dus pas/ 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dam pa'i chos mdo sde gsungs par dgongs te/ gzugs brnyan gyi chos nam du rgyun mi 'chad cing / so so'i skye bo thams
264a4(mdo sde): cad bde ba chen po thob par mdzad do/ / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul zhing ston pa'ang dus las mi yol bar gshegs/ dus las mi yol bar mya ngan las 'da' 'o//
264a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
264a6(mdo sde): pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes grags so// skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan
264a7(mdo sde): gnas su gshegs nas lha rnams kyi ston pa mdzad do/ / skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du sku tshe lo brgyad cur bzhugs par ston to//
264b1(mdo sde): bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// las rnam par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can
264b2(mdo sde): yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab po// klu'i mthu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'di ni sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi
264b3(mdo sde): khyab pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi thugs la dgongs pa shes par 'dod na/ sems can dbang po zhan pa tha ma'i bar du'ang kun shes par mdzad do//
264b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad las gang yang sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod na/ de ma thag tu mthong bar mdzad do// gal te mthong bar mi mdzad na/ mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo // de bas
264b5(mdo sde): na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa yod kyang mthong bar mi nus so/ / de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyis 'od zer cher bskyed nas/ srid pa'i rtse
264b6(mdo sde): mo man chad mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad snang bar mdzad kyang / gang 'dul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa ni mthong bar 'gyur/ gang skal ba dang mi ldan pa ni mig sngar
264b7(mdo sde): bab kyang mi mthong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa skabs kha cig ni ched du skal ba mdzad/ skabs kha cig tu ni cang mi gsung bas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/
265a1(mdo sde): shin tu dpag par dka' ba/ shin tu shes shing rtogs par dka' na/ ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la spyod pa dka' ba shin tu zab mo dri ba la spobs par gyur
265a2(mdo sde): khyod kyis zhus pa 'di ni yang dag par sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba yin te/ ngan 'gro gsum gyi lam bkag nas lha dang mi'i lam gtod pa yin no// kun dga' bo ngas pa
265a3(mdo sde): khyod la pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i spyod dka' ba'i mdo tsam zhig bstan par byas/ legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa'
265a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sngon byung ba bskal pa tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na
265a5(mdo sde): yul wA rA Na sir sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
265a6(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ 'jig rten gyi gtso bo// lha dang mi'i ston pa 'jig rten du byung ngo // sangs rgyas de'i sku tshe'i tshad
265a7(mdo sde): kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur bzhugs so/ / dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so// gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so// gzugs brnyan la
265b1(mdo sde): chos spyod pa'i tshe/ mi'i rgyal po ra tsa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yul wA rA Na si la da'ang sbyar ro// rgyal po de la btsun mo ni nyi khri yod/ blon po ni bzhi stong skad yod/ bal
265b2(mdo sde): gyi glang po che'ang lnga brgya yod/ rgyal phran drug cu la dbang / grong khyer brkyad brgya zhig yodargyal po de la bu gsum yod do// gsum car yang rgyal phran re re byed do// de'i tshe
265b3(mdo sde): de'i dus na yul wA rA Na si'i rgyal po de mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan te/ rtag tu'ang dam pa'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin pas/ gang yang snrums las chad ces bya ba med do//
265b4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i bsod nams dang yon tan gyi mthus nar chu dus las mi yol te/ le tog rgyun du legs pas/ de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang bde skying ngo // de'i tshe na wA rA Na si'i
265b5(mdo sde): rgyal po de la blon po chen po sgyu gcan zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ / blon po sgra gcan rgyal po la 'khus nas/ dmag rnam bzhi bshams pa la 'di lta ste/ ba klung gi tshogs dang / shi
265b6(mdo sde): rta'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs bshams nas/ wA rA Na si'i rgyal po la brgal nas rgyal po'i srog bcad do// de ltar rgyal po bsad nas kyang dmag gi
265b7(mdo sde): tshochogs rnam pa bzhi bkye nas/ mtha'i rgyal phran bu rab kyang bsad do// de nas rgyal bu 'bring po'ang bab nas/ mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu tha chung gi thog tu dmag drang bar bshams
266a1(mdo sde): s+ho/ drubs mtshar g+sa sa byung ba 'ang sa gasmra pa sa hU~M/ kyis 'byu pa/ / do
266a2(mdo sde): n du smra zhing 'gyur gyi/ gnod pa med pa rtag tu drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te/ log pas mi 'tshe bas yul mi rnams kyang bde skying la ngar ba/ longs spyod dang nor nu/
266a3(mdo sde): rin po cher ldan pa/ bang mdzod gang ba/ rgyal po de'i yon tan la kun gyis bsngags shing bstod pa/ bar snang gi lha dang 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyis kyang dga' zhing bkur ba/ de'i
266a4(mdo sde): tshe na rgyal po de la rgyal bu su sha de ba zhes bya ba gcig pu zhig yod de/ shin tu yid gzhungs shing gsal ba/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ lus kyi
266a5(mdo sde): mdog gser du 'dug pa/ gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba/ skyes bu'i mtshan rdzogs par ldan pa/ lo bdun lon pa zhig yod pa de la yab rgyal po'ang shin tu byams shing
266a6(mdo sde): sdug par sems so/ / de'i tshe na pho brang bsrung ba'i lha zhig rgyal po de la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po mkhyen tram/ blon po sku gcan 'khus nas yul sring phrogs te/ rgyal
266a7(mdo sde): po yab kyang bkrongs dmag gi tshogs bzhi'ang bkye nas/ rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang srog gi dbang po dang phral te/ dmag gi tshogs rnams ring po mi thogs par 'dir phyin na//
266b1(mdo sde): rgyal po ci'i phyir srog sgrubs shing gung du mi 'gro/ de'i tshe na rgyal po des de bskad ces smras pa thos nas/ lus kyi ba spu kun zing zhes byed de/ lus kyang 'dar nas yi mug cing mya ngan gyis sems
266b2(mdo sde): gdungs te/ sa la 'gre zhing brgyal bar gyur nas/ ring zhig lon pa dang cung zad sangs te dal gyis nam mkha'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar smra ba'i skad ni yod la gzugs ni mi snang ba khyod ci yin//
266b3(mdo sde): smras pa'i tshig 'di yang dag par bden nam/ lhas smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te/ rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod nams dang yon tan du bcas pas
266b4(mdo sde): drang po'i chos kyis yul srid 'dzin te/ de bas na bdag gis sngar smras pa yin te/ sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs par ma gyur par myur du byol zhing 'gro ba'i rigs so// de nas rgyal po de pho brang du
266b5(mdo sde): zhugs nas/ da ni bdag yul gzhan zhig tu 'gro dgos so snyam du bsams so// yang 'di snyam du bsams so// yul pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yod do// lam nye bar zhugs na ni
266b6(mdo sde): zhag bdun gyis pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur/ lam ring por zhugs na ni zhag bcu bzhis phyin par 'gyur bas/ ci nas lam nye bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas/ zhag bdun gyi brgyags dang
266b7(mdo sde): chas te pho brang gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / phyir pho brang gi nang du log nas/ rgyal bu su sha de ba pang du blangs te/ mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing spangs pa ltar langs nas phyir yang 'dug go/
267a1(mdo sde): / de'i tshen btsun mos de ltar mi bde zhing skrag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po chen po ci'i srang du 'jigs skrag pa lta bu'i gzug
267a2(mdo sde): ston cing / sku la'ang rdul gyis gos pa lta bu skra'ang 'dzings te/ dbugs kyang mi bde ste yul stor la thug pa 'am/ mdza' sdug pa dang bye ba 'am/ dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa lta bu dang /
267a3(mdo sde): bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag gda' ba ci lags bstan du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kho bo ci nyes pa khyod kyis shes pa ma yin gyis ma smra zhig/ btsun mos gsol pa/
267a4(mdo sde): bdag dang rgyal po lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems gcig ste/ dper na bya'i 'dab ma gnyis sam/ lus kyi rkang pa gnyis sam/ mgo'i mig gnyis sam/ de dang 'dra na
267a5(mdo sde): ci'i slad du bdag la gsang ste mi gsung / / rgyal pos/ btsun mo la smras pa/ khyod la mi shes sam// blon po sgra gcan ngan sems skyes nas/ rgyal po la 'khus te/
267a6(mdo sde): ya ba rgyal po'ang bkrongs te/ gcen rgyal bu'ang srog gi bar chad byas nas/ da lta dmag dang chas te ngal rgol du 'ongs pas kho bo yul gzhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes smras nas/ rgyal bu dge don
267a7(mdo sde): pang du blangs te lam du zhug so/ / de nas btsun mo'ang rgyal po'i phyir 'brangs te song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po mya ngan gyis non te yid 'khrugs nas// zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas lam yang nor/
267b1(mdo sde): te/ lam de'ang bgrod dka' zhing rtswa 'ang rtsub chu tsam yang med de/ zhag du ma zhig song ba las brgyags kyang chad do// thog ma gsang ste rgyal po gcig pu 'gro bar byas nas/ zhag bdun gyi brgyags las kyang ma brdzad pa las
267b2(mdo sde): lam yang nor/ mi gsum gyis kyang zos te/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs so// da dung lam ring zhig yod pa las/ brgyags chad nas/ de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mos skad phyung nas dus
267b3(mdo sde): so/ / kyi hud kyi hud re sdug thog ma btsas nas da tsam gyi bar du 'di 'dra ba ma myong ba da 'dir myong bar gyur te/ da 'dir sdug cing 'phongs so zhes zer te lag pas mgo la brdabs so// sa
267b4(mdo sde): la 'gro zhing lus la rdul gyis gos nas/ tshig 'di skad du smre sngags 'don to// bdag cag gis tshe snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas/ 'on te pha ma dang dgra bcom pa
267b5(mdo sde): bsad dam/ 'on te dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa ma/ 'on te mthun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis sam/ 'on te rngon pa dang nya pa byas sam/ 'on te srang dang bre bcos te pha rol
267b6(mdo sde): la phrog rloms byas sam/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod spyod dam/ ci byas na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur cig gu/ de skad smeng zhing cung zad bstir ni dgras sle bas na/ srog
267b7(mdo sde): gi bar chad nges par 'byung / lam du zhugs nas 'gror ni bkres pa dang skom pas nyen nas srog la bab tu cha'o// rgyal po dang btsun mo de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen te skad phyung
268a1(mdo sde): ste ngus pa dang / sa la bsgyel nas brgyal bar gyur to// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang sangs nas 'di snyam du/ gsum char lhan cig tu 'di kho nar 'chi bar
268a2(mdo sde): 'gyur gyis/ btsun mo bsad la bdag dang bu'i srog thar par bya'o snyam bsams nas/ ral gri phyung ste btsun mo bsad par bshams pa dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis rgyal
268a3(mdo sde): po'i lag pa nas bzung ste/ da ltar ci zhig mdzad dgongs zhes gsol to// yab rgyal pos mig nas mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyi
268a4(mdo sde): ma btsun mo dam pa bsang la khyod kyi srog gso snyam mo/ / gal te ma bsad kyang rang 'chi bar 'gyur te/ kho bo ni 'chi'am gson yang rung na/ bu khyod kyi srog gso ba'i phyir
268a5(mdo sde): khyod kyi ma btsun mo bsad snyam mo/ / de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis/ yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te btsun mo bsad par gyur na/ de'i sha la ba dag mi
268a6(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ gang na'ang ma'i sha la bu za ba mi srid pas/ bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur na/ yab rgyal po ci'i slad du bdag bkum ste pha ma'i srog thar par mi mdzad/ yab
268a7(mdo sde): rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ mong la 'khams te 'gyel nas sa la 'gro zhing rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kho bo'i mig dang 'dran su rang gi mig phyung
268b1(mdo sde): ste za bar byedad/ kho bo ni shi'ang bla bas du mi gsod do// bu ba sang de sha za mi nus so// de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis/ yang yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//
268b2(mdo sde): gal te yab yum gyis bdag pa kum na sha khrag kyang ring po mi thogs par ru la sums nas dgos pa ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bdag gi gsol ba gcig gcig ma gnang ma byams
268b3(mdo sde): ba'i yab yum ma lags pas/ bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas ya ba rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la khyod kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar bya bas/
268b4(mdo sde): gsol ba'i rnams myur du smros shig ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis/ yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// yab yum gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i
268b5(mdo sde): slad du/ nyin re bzhin bdag gi lus la sa sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de/ cha gnyis ni yab yum la 'bul/ cha gcig ni bdag rang 'tshal na/ lus srog
268b6(mdo sde): gzungs su 'gyur ro/ / de nas rgyal pos kyang rgyal bus gsol ba bzhin du gnang nas/ nyin gcig bzhin sha rgya ma gsum bcad de/ cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mos
268b7(mdo sde): za cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang za ste/ lus dang srog gi zungs byas nas/ lam du zhugs te song ba las/ zhag gnyis kyis yul pha rol ma sleb par rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha zad nga/
269a1(mdo sde): rus pa'i tshigs dang chub tsam zhig 'brel te/ srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas sa la 'gyel to// de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rgyal bu phang du blangs nas
269a2(mdo sde): skad chen po byung nas cho nges btab ste 'di skad ces smras so/ / nged gnyis kyis ma rig par khyod kyi sha zos te/ khyod 'di lta bu'i na tsha'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur la// lam
269a3(mdo sde): yang da dung ring bas khyod kyi lus kyi sha ni zad de/ nga ni lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro bzhag go// de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis/ skad chung ngus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces
269a4(mdo sde): gsol lo/ / da ni 'di nas pha rol tu zhag gcig tsam gyi lam las ma lus te/ bdag ni g.yo zhing bskyed mi nus pas srog 'dir 'dor ro// rgyal po dang btsun mo ni
269a5(mdo sde): mi ma rabs ngan pa ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go ma gsungs shig/ bdag la byams shing thugs brtse bar dgongs na/ bdag gis bsam pa dang mi 'gal
269a6(mdo sde): bar mdzad du gsol/ da dung yang bdag gi rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa ma lus par btogs la yul pha rol tu gshegs su gsol// de nas rgyal pos yang rgyal
269a7(mdo sde): bus gsol ba bzhin du/ tshigs dang rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa btogs nas cha gsum du bgos te/ cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mos zos ma/ cha gcig ni/
269b1(mdo sde): rgyal bus zos te/ rgyal po dang btsun mo'ang lam du zhugs nas dong ngo // rgyal bu dge don langs nas 'greng bzhin du rgyal po dang btsun mo song ba la lta'o// rgyal po
269b2(mdo sde): dang btsun mo gnyis skad phyung nas du bzhin song nas/ rgyal bu dge don gyis mig gis mi sod kyi bar du rgyal po dang btsun mo la chags pa'i sems kyis mig mi 'dzums par
269b3(mdo sde): lta ba lta nas ring zhig lon pa dang / phyir sa la 'gyel to// sha dang khrag gi dri bro bas phyogs bcu nas sbrang ma dang sha sbrang mang po 'dus nas/ rgyal bu yog pa tsam du lus
269b4(mdo sde): la za zhing 'jus te/ sdug bsngal gyis gdungs so// de'i tshe na rgyal bu de srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig ma chad de/ skad phyung nas 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo//
269b5(mdo sde): bdag gi sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las rnams ni 'dis byang zhing zad par gyur cig/ deng slan chad mi bgyid do// bdag gi lus pa ma la phul te/ sbyin pa byas pas
269b6(mdo sde): bdag gi pha ma snga ma bapas lhag pa'i bsod nams bcu gcig dang ldan te/ bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa mi rmi ba dang / lhas bsrung
269b7(mdo sde): pa dang / mis bkur ba dang / zhal mchu dang / rkun po dang / dgra dang / rku lto byed pa med cing / dus thams cad du bkra shis par shog cig/ bdag gi lus lhag ma tsam sha
270a1(mdo sde): khrag sbrang ma la byin pas thams cad du 'grangs shing tshim par gyur te/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas grub par shog cig/ sangs rgyas su grub nas chos kyi sku thob nas kyang / chos kyi
270a2(mdo sde): skus thams cad kyi bkres skom pa'i mu ge dang / skye shir 'khor ba'i nang lci ba sel bar shog cig/ rgyal bus de skad smon lam btab pa na/ gnam sa'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ nyi ma'ang 'od mi gsal bar gyur/
270a3(mdo sde): gcan gzan dang ri dgas rnams kyang skrag nas kun tu rgyug/ rgya mtsho'ang rab tu 'khrugs/ ri rab kyang 'gul zhing ldeg/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi bar du'ang rab tu g.yos so// de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos
270a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dag dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu babs nas/ rgyal bu don grub bsdigs pa'i phyir/ seng ge dang / stag dang / 'phar spyang la sogs pa'i lus su sprul nas mig bgrang / kha gdangs
270a5(mdo sde): spu bsgreng nas skad chen po'i ngare phyung ste/ rgyal dul mchod pa bzhin bsdigs so// de'i tshe rgyal bu don grub kyis gcan gzan khro bo de dag mthong nas kyang skad mi che bas 'di skad ces smras so// khyed rnams kho bo za
270a6(mdo sde): 'dod na ci der ze zhig/ 'di 'dra ba'i mthu rtsal gyis bsdigs ci dgos zhes bsgre'o// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ bdag cag ni seng ge'am gcan gzan ma yin te/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po yin te/
270a7(mdo sde): khyod bgam zhing sang du 'ongs so// de'i tshe rgyal bus brgya byin lha'i dbang po mthong nas shin tu dga' mgur rangs par yang gyur to// de nas brgya byin gyis// rgyal bu la smras pa/ khyod kyis shin tu gtang dka' ba gtang
270b1(mdo sde): ste lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pa 'di'i bsod nams kyis khyod bdud kyi rgyal por 'dod dam/ 'on te tshungs pa'i rgyal po 'deng ngam/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ mi'i rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i
270b2(mdo sde): rgyal po 'dod/ rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni bdud kyi rgyal po'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i rgyal po 'am/ mi'i rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang yang mi 'dod de/ sems can thams cad rnam
270b3(mdo sde): par grol bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni shin tu'ang gti mug can zhig yin pa 'dra/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni
270b4(mdo sde): yun ring po nas shin tu dka' bas bsgrubs pas gzod 'grub ce'o/ / khyod kyis shin tu sdug bsngal ba bzod ngam/ rgyal bus smras pa/ gal te lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba bdag gi spyi bo'i steng na rgyun tu 'pho/
270b5(mdo sde): yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyis smras pa stong pa 'di la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ de nas rgyal bus dam bcas
270b6(mdo sde): nas smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ / gal te bdag gi smra ba'i tshig brdzun te lha'i dbang po bslus par gyur na/ bdag gi lus kyi rma 'di nam du'ang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig/ gal te smra ba'i tshig bdenan bdag gi
270b7(mdo sde): lus kyang sor chung cing khrag kyang 'o mar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu/ lus kyi rma'ang snga ma kho na bzhin sor chud de/ khrag kyang 'a mar gyur nas/ rgyal bu'i byang gzugs kyang snga ma bas lhag par bzang zhing sdug
271a1(mdo sde): pa dang mdzes par gyur te/ langs nas lha'i dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bas phyag byas so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal bu khyed legs so// shin tu legs so// shin tu dab
271a2(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus kyis gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ / ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa na/ thog mar bdag gi/
271a3(mdo sde): don mdzad par gyur cig ces smras nas/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po'ang nam mkha'i phyogs de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo'ang rgyal po nga rol po de'i drung du phyin nas/ rgyal po des kyang rgya ma
271a4(mdo sde): nas bsu nas/ dgos pa'i yo byad yod bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo ngas rgyal bus lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la ji ltar bstabs pa rgyal po de la zhib tu brjod pa dang / rgyal po des ji ltar brjod pa de
271a5(mdo sde): dag thos nas/ rgyal bu de'i lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pas sri zhu cher byas pa'i drin lan bas pa nas/ dpag rnam bzhi bshams nas/ rgyal po de dang yul wA rA Na sir dmag drangs so// de'i tshe rgyal po
271a6(mdo sde): de dmag rnam bzhi dang chas nas lam du zhugs te/ rgyal bu dang bral ba'i gnas su phyin pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi bu ni gdon mi za bar 'di nyid du shi na/ bu'i rus pa tsam bsdus te phyir bdag gi yul du bskur ro//
271a7(mdo sde): snyam du sems nas/ skad phyung nas ngu zhing bu'i rus bu sdud du song song ba las/ rgyang ma nas bdag gi bu'i lus kyi rma'ang sos nas/ snga ma pas bzang zhing mdzes te drung du 'ongs so// de nas rgyal pos pa ngang
271b1(mdo sde): blangs te/ khyod da dung gson nam zhes smras pa dang / rgyal bu'i ji ltar gyur pa yab rgyal po dang btsu na mo la smras so// rgyal po dang btsun ma rab tu dga' ste/ thams cad bgrang la zhon nas/ phyir bdag gi yul du phyin
271b2(mdo sde): pa dang / rgyal bu de'i bsod nams de'i mthus bdag gi yul yang phyir thob nas/ rgyal bu don grub rgyal por dbang bskur te rgyal por bcug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de'i tshe de'i
271b3(mdo sde): dus na yab rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du khyod sems na/ / de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal po de ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na
271b4(mdo sde): yum du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ / de de ltar mi blta'o// de ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu doran grub ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhar zhig yin snyam du
271b5(mdo sde): khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu de ni da ltar shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nga yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur pa da ltar kun shes ko'u di n+ya zhes bya ba yin no//
271b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis pha ma la sri zhu byeng ba'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyi shu snyad kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don la mkhas pa'i
271b7(mdo sde): tshig gi spobs pa thob par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod po thob bo// gzhan yang phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
272a1(mdo sde): rdul phra rab snyed kyis theg pa gnyis kyi sems spangs te/ theg pa gcig gis mthar phyin par gyur to// dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen mardul phra rab snyed kyi 'bras bu dang po nas/ theg pa
272a2(mdo sde): gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to/ / lha dang mi brgya stong snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ma yin pa lha dang / klu dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin dang /
272a3(mdo sde): dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa mang po rnams la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
272a4(mdo sde): kyi bar du sems bskyed par gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir/ lus kyi sha khrag gis
272a5(mdo sde): kyang pha ma la bltabs shing / shin tu spyad dka' ba spyod pa ni 'di lta bu yin no// 'khor mang po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas/ so so nas phan pa dang bde ba'i don rnyed de/ dga' rangs nas
272a6(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo // thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsapa pa'i mdo las/ sri zhu'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o//
272a7(mdo sde): / bam po gnyis pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po'i nang na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis skar ma mang po zil gyis mnan pa lta bu'am
272b1(mdo sde): 'khyil pa'i 'ja' tshon ltar 'tsher zhing gsal ba la bsta mi chags pa bzhin nam/ bsams na yid 'khrul pa tsam du 'od zer lham me lcang nger bzhugs te/ dper na mi bzod pa ni srin bu me khyer gyi 'od nyi ma shar ma thag tu mi snang
272b2(mdo sde): babam nyi zla la 'od zer brgya stong snyed yod kyang / brgya byin gyi drung na sol phung lta bu 'am/ brgya byin la 'od gsal ba yod kyang tshangs pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi drung na gyo mo 'am
272b3(mdo sde): gseg ma lta bu 'am/ mtshan mo dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od du bskrun pa tsam mam/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po'i 'od zer dam pa brgya stong snyed yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs
272b4(mdo sde): pa'i 'od zer gyi drung na sol ba'i phung po ltar gyur to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer mdog gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur to// de dag na
272b5(mdo sde): gnas pa'i sems can dag la 'od zer des reg na/ dmus long ni mig gis gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/ lus sgur po ni lus rangs par 'gyur/ dbang po nyams pa rnams ni dbang po tshang zhing yan lag dang
272b6(mdo sde): nying lag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / myos pa rnams ni dran pa phyir rnyed par 'gyur/ mdor na ji tsam du yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad dang bral te 'dod pa bzhin thob par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
272b7(mdo sde): de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu snyed stan las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu
273a1(mdo sde): 'khod do/ / thams cad kyis skad mthun par tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ba sam
273a2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtog med dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' bde ba 'ba' zhig sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems

274a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas/ 'od zer de dag las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos par 'gyur/ chos de dag thos nas sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral
274a7(mdo sde): te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas// lha'i rin po che gser ltar sems rnam par dag par 'gyur bas/ thams cad gsal bar snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro// bdag cag gis phan pa dang bde ba'i
274b1(mdo sde): yon tan 'di lta bu dag dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ston pa chen por 'du shes skyes so/ / byams pa'i pha lta bu'i 'du shes skyes nas/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran te/ sangs rgyas kyi bka'
274b2(mdo sde): drin shes par bgyid do/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dam pa'i chos thos pas ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can thams cad sgrol
274b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag kyang chos thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
274b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu po 'di dag yun ring po nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab kyi sngon rol na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
274b5(mdo sde): brgya steng snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed la bsnyen bkur byas te/ sangs rgyas de dag las rtag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing / rgyal ba de dag la mi skyo ba'i sems kyis mnyes par byas nas/
274b6(mdo sde): byams pas bdag gi lus bsrungs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin cing / snying rje chen pos rgyun du phyogs bcur thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed do// sems can gang zhig tha ma shr-i kar byang
274b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag la gcig gi ming ngam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi nas/ bdun cubi bar du rdzogs par thos te/ de las srog phyogs skyabs su song na/ tshe 'phos
275a1(mdo sde): ma thag tu gang na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+mo las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod chags dang yongs su bral ba dang / mngal gyi gnas nas mi skye ba
275a2(mdo sde): dang mnam zhing brtsog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag cing / lus dri zhim pa dang / thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro// kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byas
275a3(mdo sde): pas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / sems rab tu dga' bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas
275a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems skyed par 'gyur/ de ltar byams pa snying rje'i sems bskyed pas/ 'gro ba ma lus pa la btang snyoms su mi gtong ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur/
275a5(mdo sde): gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bar chad du 'gyur ba bsal ba'i sems dang / nyon mongs pa zhi bar
275a6(mdo sde): byed pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la snyan cing rtag tu bkur sti byed pa'i sems dang / 'dun pa'i yid kyis chos nyan pa'i sems dang / mi brjed par yid la byed cing / don bzang po
275a7(mdo sde): gzungs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang / nyung ngu thos la don mang du shes pa'i sems dang / mang du thos la don mi shes pa mi 'dod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dag pa nyid la dang pa'i sems
275b1(mdo sde): dang de bzhin nyid kyi don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skyes pas ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// ji lta
275b2(mdo sde): bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skyes pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skyes pas/ sems can thams cad la mnyam snyoms gnyen po'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro//
275b3(mdo sde): ji ltar bdag khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa ltar skye bar mi dga' ba bzhin du gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / rkang bzhi dang / rkang mangs dang / grog sbur nas/ srog chags thams cad
275b4(mdo sde): kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog gi bar du stor yang pha rol po'i srog pa phrog pa'i las mi byed do// ji ltar bdag la nor rdzas dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / zas dang /
275b5(mdo sde): skom dang / ba glang dang / shing rta dang / theg pa dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnams la srung zhing rim gror byed do//
275b6(mdo sde): gzhan gyis khyer zhing 'phrog pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang sems can rnams kyi nor dang / gos dang /
275b7(mdo sde): zas dang / skom dang / longs spyod la 'phrog pa'i sems mi skyed do// ji ltar bdag gi gzugs dam pa sring mo 'am/ chung ma 'am/ slas la gzhan gyis mi rigs par byed mi 'dod pa
276a1(mdo sde): bzhin du/ sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang / pha rol po'i gzugs dam pa la 'du shes ngan pa
276a2(mdo sde): log pa'i sems mi skyed na/ mi rigs pa'i chos ngan pa lta ci smos/ ji ltar bdag phra ma dang tshig rtsub po 'khrug par 'gyur ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na
276a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang brdzun du smra ba dang phan tshun 'khrug pa'i tshig mi smra'o/ / ji ltar bdag rdo dbyug gis brdeg pa dang / lcag gis gzhu ba dang / nan la 'bor ba
276a4(mdo sde): la mi dga' ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang rdo dbyug dang / lcags dang / chad pas bcad pa'i las kyis sems
276a5(mdo sde): can rnams la mi 'tshe'o/ / ji ltar bdag lcags sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / mtshon cha dang / bzung ba dang / btags pa dang / bcing bas bcings pa'i gnod pa rnams la mi dga' ba bzhin du
276a6(mdo sde): sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog yal yang lcags sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / mtshon cha dang / bzung ba dang / btags pa dang / bcing ba la
276a7(mdo sde): sogs pa'i gnod pas 'tshe bar mi byed do/ / ji ltar bdag gzhan gyis brnyas pa dang / dbang dang drag shul byed pa dang / dbang rlom btsan byed bsnyems shing ngan du byed pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du
276b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gcig pu'i lus dang srog yal yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i mi rigs pas/ sems can la gnod pa mi byed do// ji ltar
276b2(mdo sde): bdag la pha rol po gzhan gyis bkur sti byed cing mchod dam/ tshig snyan pas bstod na/ bdag bde ba la dga' ba bzhin du bdag kyang sems can rnams la gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / mal cha dang /
276b3(mdo sde): nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sbyin par byed do// gal te bdag gis lam chen po zhig sgrub pam/ sangs rgyas kyi phyir ram/ chos kyi phyir ram/ dge 'dun gyi phyir ram/ don bsgrub
276b4(mdo sde): pa las blos mi lcogs grub par ma gyur nas mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis gdungs pa las/ mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag gis sgrub pa'i don ma grub pas mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par mthong na bdag la 'di skad
276b5(mdo sde): zer ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod mi dga' bar ma byed cig/ khyod kyi don grub pa'i grogs bya'o// don yid bzhin du grub par bya'o zhes zer na/ de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ de bas na
276b6(mdo sde): bdag gi sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du bsgrub pa'i las kyi grogs bya'o/ / ji ltar bdag la rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / chu'am/ mes gnod par 'gyur ram/ blon po la sogs pas
276b7(mdo sde): bzung ngam/ btags sam/ bcings nas mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur pa las/ mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag de ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs pa mthong na/ snyan pa sgra'i tshig gis
277a1(mdo sde): bdag la khyod mya ngan ma byed cig/ khyod kyi phyir kho bos rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la gsol ba btab ste/ gal te na nor sug sbyin pa 'am/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ci nas kyang khyod
277a2(mdo sde): mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal las thar par bya'o zer na/ bdag gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyis sems dga' bar gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' mi shes par bya ba'i sgyu rtsal dang bzo'i bar du mthar phyin
277a3(mdo sde): par brtson 'grus su slob bo/ / 'di lta ste/ shes par bya ba rig pa'i gnas dang / bzo'i gnas dang / rol mo dang / rtsed mo dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / mig 'phrul gyi sngags dang
277a4(mdo sde): sman dang / baglang dang / rta dang / gzhon pa dang / dgra chos dang / dmag drang ba dang / dpyad la sogs pa la mkhas par slob ste/ de ltar sgyu rtsal ci la'ang mkhas par bslabs nas// 'gro ba mang po dang
277a5(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / blon po chen po la sogs pa'ang bsams pa'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang longs spyod kyi rkyen gos sam/ nor ram/ zas sam/ bza' ba 'am/ btung ba'am/ nong du
277a6(mdo sde): 'am gdu bu 'am/ lus kyi rgyan nam/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ bai DUR+Ya 'am/ man shel lam spug gam/ mu tig gam/ asma gar b+ha 'am/ nor du rin po che 'am/ baglang 'am
277a7(mdo sde): Sham/ theg pa 'am/ bran po'am/ las byed pa'i mibam/ chung ma'am/ slas kyang yod/ chu mig gam/ khrus kyi rdzing bu'am/ rin po che yang thog bzang po 'am/ longs spyod kyi yo byangad rnam pa snga tshogs
277b1(mdo sde): yod kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de la rlom pa 'am/ rgyags pa'i sems med do// de ltar sgyu rtsa la kun yang mkhas/ rin po che'i bang mdzod brgya stong dang yang ldan/ bgrang dang / rta dang / theg pa'ang yod na
277b2(mdo sde): chung ma bzang mo'ang grangs med par yod/ yang thog bzang po'ang yod/ chu mig dang khrus kyi rje lu la sogs pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang yang yod mod kyi/ de la ma chags te/ rtag tu 'dod pa nyung ba dang / chog shes
277b3(mdo sde): pa la dga' zhing / bas mtha' dgon pa dang / ri dang / tshal dang / shing drung du bsam gtan la zhi bar gnas pa la mos so// skye bo mang po dang zhing gtam zer yang / sems ni rtag tu gnyen po'i sgor 'jug par
277b4(mdo sde): byed do/ / so so'i skye bo dang spyod tshul mthun pa ltar byed kyang sems can la phan pa'i don du nor bu rin po che gtong bar byed kyi/ sems can la gnod pa mi phan pa'i don mi byed do// gang dbul ba 'phongs pa'am thag
277b5(mdo sde): par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la slong du 'ongs na/ de la ci 'dod pa bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sbyin par byed do// sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos shing dad de/ byang chub sems dpa' la
277b6(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur dang mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rim gro dang g.yog byed cing / rkang pa 'khru ba'i las byed dam/ lus bkra ba dang mnye ba'i las byed dam/ chag chag dang phyag bdar byed dam/ so shing dang khrus chus sbyor ram
277b7(mdo sde): mal stan 'ding zhing mal gos sprug pa'i las byed ngam/ srong dang tho rangs la ma rim 'brang ngam/ khye sus dang / drol kha zas than pan dang / pu sha ni dang / khang na 'bul lam
278a1(mdo sde): 'thung ba'i skom yu li shi dang / bu lar sha ka'i 'bras bu'i skom dang / rgun chu dang / khar nag po'i chul sogs pa sbyar sbyar nas/ yo byad de lta bus zhag bdun nam zhag dgu bcu'i bar du byang
278a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'bul bar byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe mchod pa'i yo byad 'bul ba de la dga' ba'i sems med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs
278a3(mdo sde): med pa yun ring po nas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la skyed 'bri'i sems med pa'i phyir// byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir/ mnyam snyoms pa'i sems la gnas
278a4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro/ / de bas na dus kha cig tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed de/ rtag tu dge ba bcu'i chos kyis sems can gyi den byed do// sems can de dag kyang rgyal po'i yid bzhin du dga' zhing spod pa'i tshe'i dus
278a5(mdo sde): byas na'ang lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod mchog dam pa dang ldan te/ rigs che zhing mtho bar skye bar 'gyur// bsams pa'i yid bzhin du nyal ba dang / ldang ba dang / 'gro ba la gnod pa med par 'gyur/
278a6(mdo sde): gnas gang du 'gro'ang bzhon pa'i rta dang theg par ldan te skyed mos tshal du rtse do mo dang / rol mo la rtse zhing longs spyod par 'gyur/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dam pa dang / dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur yang / tha ma mi rtag pa brten
278a7(mdo sde): te rga ba dang na bas gzir te shi bar gyur na/ khyim gyi bu smad mya ngan gyis gdungs te skad phyung nas ngu zhing / la la ni mgo la thal mo rdebs/ la la ni rang rang gi skra 'bal te/ mchi ma 'dzag cings la 'gre'o//
278b1(mdo sde): de nas khyogs sam shing rta'i steng du bzhag nas/ dur khrong du spel te/ de ltar bskyal nas kyang bu smad dag phyir khyim du 'ongs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te/ la la ni brgyal nas sa la 'gre/ la la ni de'i rkyen gyis nang du gyur/
278b2(mdo sde): la la ni mi dran pas myos/ la ya ni tshe'i bar chad du shi bar byas te/ de ltar byas kyang gson pa rnams la ni phan pa med/ shi ba la ni rab tu gnod ngo // de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te
278b3(mdo sde): yul rgyu zhing song ba las/ sems can mya ngan gyis gzir ba mthong nas/ snying brtse ba'i sems skyes te 'di skad zer ro// rgyal po zhes bya ba ni yul sa dbang gis 'gro ba mang po dbang sgyur te/ de ltar dge ba
278b4(mdo sde): bcu'i lam gyis 'gro ba rnams brtul te/ 'bras bu 'dod pa lnga mchog dam pa thog tu zin kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mi rtag pas 'jigs pas thar par ma gyur na/ bdag gis drang po'i dbang
278b5(mdo sde): rjes kyis yul gyi srid btsas kyang phan pa'i don meng do/ / de ltar 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don med na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes kyang ji skad ces kyang bya/ byams pa chen po'i pha zhe 'am spun
278b6(mdo sde): pa rgyal po chen po zhe 'am/ 'dren pa'i ston pa chen po zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i lam du 'dren cing / mya ngani las 'das pa'i lam ston te/ 'dus ma byas pa'i rab tu bde ba thob par byed do// bdag cag ni ming
278b7(mdo sde): dang spyod par mi mthun te/ / dper na mi zhig skom pas gdungs nas srog la bab pa las/ chu 'dod pa'i phyir phan tshun brgyugs te khron pa skam po cig dang phrad nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te 'di snyam du sems so//
279a1(mdo sde): da ni bdag gi lus 'di 'chi ba la phyir sos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te chu dang ma phrad na/ srog 'di 'chi ba las mi ring ba las// nga khron pa bzang po dang phrad nas/ gdon mi za bar chu dong
279a2(mdo sde): grang mo gtsang ma dang phrad de/ ngoms shing tshim par 'gyur bas/ srog 'tshe bar 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas/ myur ba myur bar khron pa'i drung du bsnyen to// khron pa'i drung du phyin nas lus la gyon pa'i gos phung de phyogs cig tu sba
279a3(mdo sde): nas lachu 'dod pa'i phyir khron pa'i nang du zhugs so/ / khron pa'i gting du phyin nas chu ni med kyi/ sbrul gdug pa dang / rmigs pa dang / sdig pa dang / rtsangs pa dang / sbal pa dang / gyo mo dang / de la sogs pa gseg ma dang
279a4(mdo sde): shing dang / rtswa nyal nyil 'ba' zhig mthong bar gyur to// de'i tshe skom pas nyam thag par gyur pa de thog ma re ba bzhin du chu'ang ma rnyed la/ gdug pa mang pos gzas nas khron pa de las phyir byung bar gzas kyang khron pa brnyings/
279a5(mdo sde): shing zhig la zab kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam yod do// de'i nang nas skas sam/ thag srang ngam/ 'bru ba'i shing tsam yang med de/ mas mchod du stsal kyang nyam thag la stongs zhan pas 'da' mi nus te/ phyir yang zhabs su lhung
279a6(mdo sde): nas sprul gdug pa la sogs pas za zhing 'jib bo/ / de cung zad cig srog ma chad kyi bar du 'di skad ces zer ro// bdag khron pa 'di'i nang na nu med par sngar shes na lha khron pa 'di la mig gis lta'ang mi phod na 'di'i nang du zhugs
279a7(mdo sde): pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ da ni khron pa 'di'i rkyen gyis sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro zhes smre sngags 'don no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang de ltar so so'i skye bo dag gcig shi ba'i 'og tu
279b1(mdo sde): khyim gang gi bu sa da mas kyis sdug pa dngabye bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa mthong nas 'din dazer ro/ / bdag gi lus 'di ni khron pa smram po de dang 'dra ste/ khren pa'i ming tsam yod kyi// tshun mdangs na/
279b2(mdo sde): 'jug pa yod kyang thog pa med pas de lta bu'i lus dang srog stor pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to// da ltar bdag 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang sgyur zhing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyis 'gro ba
279b3(mdo sde): 'dul zhing drang po'i tshes kyis yul gyi srid btsas nas/ skye bo mang po dang lha dang mi'i mthe ris kyi gnas su bkod de// 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan mchog dam pa la longs spong du bcug kyang // de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
279b4(mdo sde): na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / sdug pa dang / bye bral dang / dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal las thar par ma nus te/ gcig la gcig pu zhing tshe de byed pa 'di ni bdag gis nyes kyi/ sems can rnams kyis mnyes so// de ji lta zhe na/ bdag
279b5(mdo sde): la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba med do/ / bdag las dge ba'i chos 'dod cing rab tu bde ba 'dod kyang sdug bsngal gyi mtshe las rgal mi nus so// de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
279b6(mdo sde): po'ang 'di snyam du sems so/ / da ltar bdag gi lus 'di ni dpe ran shes pa med pa/ gti mug can gyi sbyin bdag dang 'dra'o// de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig lo bdun gyi bar du char pa ma bab pas/ zan pa chen po byung ste/
279b7(mdo sde): dri shing yang bskams/ 'bru'ang rab tu dkon par gyur/ mu ge chen po byung ste/ gcig la gcig 'chal zhing za bar gyur/ gcig gi sha khrag la gcig pa ste/ la la ni bu'i sha khrag la pham za/ la la
280a1(mdo sde): pha ma'i sha la bu za zhing / pha ma dang / phunu dang / khyo shug dang / bu pho dang / bu mo 'ang gcig gi shal gcig za bar gyur to// de'i tshe na sbyin bdag chen po de 'chag cing 'phyan du song song ba las/ sems
280a2(mdo sde): can mang po dag ltogs nas da rod nyams te/ rid cing skams la nyam chung la mdog ngan pa dang / sla'ang 'dzings nas lus gnag la rke ba dag/ 'phrag pa la mi ro khur du khyer te/ kha cig ni mi'i mgo dang / lag pa dang
280a3(mdo sde): rkang pa dang / lha tshigs dang / lag ngar dang / phrag pa dang / tshigs pa dang / sbal pa dang / brla dang / rje ngar dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi bar du khyer/ kha cig ni nang khrol mchin pa dang / mcher
280a4(mdo sde): pa dang / gro ba dang / rgyu ma dang / gzhan rnams khyer pa mthong ngo // de lta bu dag mthong nas sbyin bdag des de dag mthong nas/ khyed khur du khyer ba 'di dag ci yin zhes dris so// de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gi
280a5(mdo sde): bur du byed pa 'di dag ni mi re ste/ mi'i mgo dang / rkang lag dang / brla dang / rje ngar dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi bar du'o// khyed mi'i mgo dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi bar du khyer ba 'di ci dgos/ ci zhes bya
280a6(mdo sde): zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyod mi shes sam/ mu ge chen po byung nas 'bru rab tu dkon par gyur te/ mi kun ltogs nas da ltar gcig la gcig za bas bdag cag gi khur du khyer ba 'di ni bdag cag gi zas
280a7(mdo sde): yin no/ / de'i tshe sbyin bdag chen po des de skad ces smras pa de thos nas sngangs te/ spu zing zhes byed nas 'khams te sal 'gyel ba las/ chu grang mos gdong du gtor nas ring zhig lon pa dang
280b1(mdo sde): sems sor chud nas 'o na khyed kyi zas yin na/ 'di dag su'i sha yin dris pa dang / de dag skad chen po phyung nas ngus te/ sbyin bdag la brjod du mi rung ngo zhes smras te/ e ma'o bdag cag ni sdug go// e ma'o bdag
280b2(mdo sde): cag ni sdug go/ / kyi hud kyi hud khyod la drang por mi smrar mi rung ste/ bdag cag khur du khyer ba 'di la la ni pa'i sha/ la la ni ma'i sha/ la la ni bu'i sha/ la la ni pu nu'i sha/ la la ni gnyen bshes kyi sha yin no zhes
280b3(mdo sde): ltogs te/ de dag gis so so nas sbyin bdag la drang por gtam byas nas/ bdag cag ni shin tu ltogs pas gcig la nyid sha za bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sbyin bdag des dbugs kyis brnangs pa tsam du/ mi ltogs pa
280b4(mdo sde): rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyed rnams der phyin chad gcig la gcig nyid za bar ma byed cig/ khyed rnams la dgos pa'i yo byad gang yang rung ba bgo ba'i gos sam/ bza' ba 'am/ btung ba 'am/
280b5(mdo sde): nad kyi rkyen rtsi 'am/ yo byad ci dgos pa thams cad sbyin par bya ste/ zhag bdun na khyed rnams kho bo'i sgor shog cig dang / yid bzhin du gos sam/ kha zas sam/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang ci 'dod pas tshim par
280b6(mdo sde): bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang / de dag rab tu dga' rangs nas/ shin tu legs so legs so// ngo mtshar che'o zhes bstod pa byas so// de nas sbyin bdag de phyir khyim du 'ongs nas/ chung ma dang / bu
280b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / bran khol dang / las byed pa'i mi rnams kyang bsdus te/ dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/ 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig snyan pa so bu smad dang / bran khol dang / las byed pa'i mi rnams la
281a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ / khyed rnams shes par gyis shig/ kho bos smras pa'i tshig legs par nyon cig/ khyed shes sam/ zan pa chen pos mu ge byung nas/ mi thams cad ltogs te grangs med pa
281a2(mdo sde): zhig shi bar gyur to/ / bdag gi khyim nabang mdzod kun gang zhing lud de/ 'bru yang grangs med yod pas dus las ma yol bar bdag cag bsod nams bya'o zhes/ bu smad kun gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas
281a3(mdo sde): legs so legs so/ / bdag cag gi srog lus sbyin pa byas kyang mi 'phangs na/ bang mdzod dang / nor rdzas dang / kha zas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas sbyin bdag kyang rab tu dga' rangs nas/
281a4(mdo sde): khyed rnams ni yang dag par kho bo'i bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'i grogs yin pa lta dge'o legs so// khyed rnams kyang so so nas ci dang ci bya ba rnams ci dang sgrub bskol bya ba'i rigs pa'ang mod la bya// sgrub
281a5(mdo sde): pa'i rigs pa'ang myur du bsgrub ste/ da ste zhag bdun na nges par 'byor par bya'o// de'i tshe sbyin bdag des so sor bsgo nas/ khyim gyi phyi rol tu byung ste/ gang nas mnyam zhing yang sa la bde ba'i gnas
281a6(mdo sde): shig bltas nas/ mod las gzhi dag nyal nyil sa rngo med par byas phyags te/ khri stan bshams so// de ltar mang po 'dra ba'i gnas sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sa gzhi bshams nas/ ba glang lnga brgya la kha zas bkal te/
281a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i sar bskyal nas/ kha zas ni ri bzhin du spungs/ zho chu ni mtsho bzhin du bskyil/ mar dang / 'bru mar dang / 'khur ba la sogs pa kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa ro mcho ga sbyar te/ de ma yin pa gzhan
281b1(mdo sde): / yang gos dang / gdu bu dang / 'phreng ba dang / lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang / ba glang dang / rta dang / rin po che sna bdun la sogs te thams cad phun snam tshogs par sbyar nas/ zhag bdun lon pa'i skye rang
281b2(mdo sde): shar nas/ zhag bdun gyi nyi ma la dril rnga brdungs/ dung bus te/ skang chen pos thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas 'dir 'dus shig ces bos so// de'i tshen thams cad kyis bos pa'i skad thos nas/ 'phags pas byin gyis
281b3(mdo sde): brlabs pa tsam du dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ thams cad sbyin pa gtong ba'i gnas su lhags te/ yid bzhin du gos dang / mal cha dang / zas skom dang / lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang / nad kyi rtsi sman mang po dang / ba
281b4(mdo sde): glang dang / rta dang / rin po che sna bdun la sogs ci dang ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du drangs nas sbyin pa'i rdzas ci yod pa thams cad kyis ma lus par khyer ro// de nas sbyin bdag de dga' nas phyir khyim du 'ongs nas/ rlung ma dang bu rnams
281b5(mdo sde): dga' ba bzhin du 'dong pa lnga la ljongs spyod do/ / de nas kyang zhag bdun tsam len pa dang // mi dag na re sbyin bdag des sngar gros dang / zas dang / skom la sogs pa sbyin pa byas na/ kha zas zos pa rnams drug langs nas tham
281b6(mdo sde): ci'i zhes ze 'o/ / ge bar byung ba'i tham sa kyi ni su bad ma ma / ma tho 'o/ ra sbyi pas chen po bang na la bying bri'i phyi mi dang ba na du la zas pa gas pas t
281b7(mdo sde): shim par byas te/ lus dang srog gson par byas par gyur na/ phyis zhag mang po ma lon par dug langs nas thams cad gi'i le bya bar sgrogs par gyur to// de'i tshe sbyin bdag chen po des de ltar gyur pa de thos na yi
282a1(mdo sde): mug cing mi dga' bar gyur te/ chung ma dang bu la sogs pa la khyed kyis kha zas ji ltar sbyar na/ kha zas kyi nang du dug marungs pa ji ltar 'ongs zhes dris pa dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bram rol dang
282a2(mdo sde): las byed pa'i mi rnams kyi mchid nas dug mi sid de/ / dug 'dig la 'ongs nib tu tshogs shig ces smras so// de nas sbyin bdag de khyim gyi zhal ta byed cing mthar gyis song song ba las/ khron pa zhig steng bkab cing
282a3(mdo sde): g.yogs pa mthong ngo / / khron pa 'di ci'i phyir g.yogs zhes dris pa dang / rngon pa 'di na khyim bdag 'di khyod byis pa rlung ngu'i tshun// sbrul gdug pa gsum zhig gso gso ba las/ khron pa 'di brkos nas
282a4(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa gsum bcug go/ / khron pa 'di ni sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa yin no// chu'ang drug pa'i chu 'di'ang 'thungs pas na ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sbyin bdag des tshig de dag thos nas/ las byed pa la
282a5(mdo sde): khyed de bar kha zas g.ye ba'i tshe/ khron nu 'di las bcus te kha zas ma g.yos sam/ las byed pas smras pa/ ba zas mang du g.yo bas rings nas nu 'di bcus nas la zas kyi g.yos byas so zhes bsgo'o//
282a6(mdo sde): khyim bdag mi dga' ste ngo 'tshar che'o// bdag ni gti mug can shes pa'i blo med pa yin pa 'dra ste/ ci'i phyir sbrul gdug pa gso zhing khron pa gdug pa rko zhes 'gyod nas/ rlung ma dang bu la bsgob/ sbrul gdug
282a7(mdo sde): pa gsum gyi khron pa myur du khongs shig/ sbrul gdug pa gsum yang kho bo bdag gis bsreg go zhes bsgo ba dang / las byed pa'i mi rnams kyis de ma thag tu khron pa de'ang bsub nas med par byas so// de nas sbyin
282b1(mdo sde): bdag des sbrul gdus pa'i khron pa de med par byas nas/ phyi rol tu 'chag tu sang pa lus sbyin bdag gi kha zas dug can gyis yi ra gyur pa dag thams cad tshig mthun par sbyin bdag 'dis bdag cags
282b2(mdo sde): kha zas dug can byin nas/ bdag cag sngar shi bar gyur pa yin no// bdag cag gis de ltar shes na/ der mo song yang rung zhes 'gyod pa skyes so// de bzhin du 'khor les sbyar ba'i rgyal po do'ang dge ba bcus sems can
282b3(mdo sde): btul te/ sems can dag lnga dang mi'i mdzeris su skye zhing 'dod ba lnga la 'dod dpung long spyod mod kyi skye ba dang / rgab dang / na bdang 'chi ba las mi thar pa'ang de dang 'dra'o// de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i
282b4(mdo sde): rgyal po de'i mod la bdag bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos bsgrubs te/ sems can rnams kyang de la klog pa dang / 'den pa dang / 'dri ba dang / goms par bya ste/ skye shi'i
282b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba yongs su spangs shing mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya'o zhes dam bcas so/ / de'i tshe na 'dir los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas kyi chos sus shes zhes
282b6(mdo sde): gnas pan d+ha bka btags so/ / 'khor los gyur ba'i rgyam po ches 'ded pa'i phyi gnas su kyang kAr btags kyi lashes pa ma byung ngo // mnga' bolab kyi yu la chung drug cig tu dran pa dang / de na ngam
282b7(mdo sde): ze cig gcig sangs rgyas kyi chos shes zhes zer ro/ / de nas bram ze de'i steng du po nya btang nas/ po nyide bram ze ga la ba der phyin nas/ btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos shes sam zhes dris na shes so
283a1(mdo sde): zhes zer ro/ / de nas pho nyas bram ze'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ btsun pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos spyan 'dren du btang gi/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de gal
283a2(mdo sde): bder gshegs su gsol/ de nas bram ze'ang der 'ongs nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rgyang ma nas bsu ste/ rkang pa laM mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bde bar byon tam/ lam du nyon mongs par ma gyur
283a3(mdo sde): ta ma ngal bar ma gyur tam zhes gtam dris te pho brang gi nang du khrid nas/ pho brang gi dbus su rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag go/ bram zes kyang gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal pos

283a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos shes so zhes zer ro/ / de nas rgyal pos bram ze la ston pa chen po bdag lo bstan cing bshad du gsol zhes byas na/ bram ze na re rgyal po khyod ni shin tu glen no// kho bos sangs
283a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos bslabs pa na/ yun ring du dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong nas gdod lobs pa yin na/ nga rgyal pos thal phyung du thos par 'dod dam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ston pa chen po 'o na ci zhig 'dod/
283a7(mdo sde): bram zes spras pa/ bdag la mchod pa phul cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ston pa chen po mchod pa ci zhig 'dod/ gos sam/ mal cha'am/ bza' ba 'am/ btung ba 'dod dam/ 'on te gser ram/

283b2(mdo sde): 'am grong khyer ram/ chung ma 'am/ bu 'dod dam/ rol mo 'am/ klu 'am/ gar byed pa 'dod dam/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag ni de dag gang yang mi 'dod do// gal te lus la rma stong phyung ste/ ma

283b6(mdo sde): ma shi'i da yang bdag gi lus 'di'ang mthor 'jig cing rul bar gyur pas phan pa med de da ni dus la bab bo snyam bsams nas/ ston pa bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so// ston pa chen po bdag mchod pa

284a1(mdo sde): nyes gtol med de/ rgyal po da ltar ci zhig mdzad snyam dgongs zhes gsol lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag gis lus 'di la mar me stong zhig btsugs te ston pa bram ze la mchod pa bya snyam mo//

284a3(mdo sde): dogs nas gso ba'i rim gro cher byed na/ ci'i phyir bdag gi lus la mtho 'tsham zhing gnod par bgyid/ rgyal po ni mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa lags na/ da ltar myos sam/ 'on te yi dgas kyis brlams sam/

285a7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ da ni bdag le'ur gyur pa lta/ 'khor mang po 'di snyed kyi nang na/ mi 'ga' yang kho bo'i grogs su 'gyur ba med dam zhes smra bar gyur to// de'i tshen rgyal
